Inside Cindy's crop, you watch as the whole place is shook around. When everything is calm again, two more berries slid into the stomach. There is only one left, not including you. When that passes on, so will you. You punch the side of the crop for the 12th time since you fell in here. You need out!

Cindy walks back into the mansion. Maybe Blanc, her father's Blastoise butler and friend could help her. Only problem was that he was off fishing for the weekend and wouldn't be back until tomorrow evening. Cindy walked into her bedroom inside the mansion. She was rubbing her gut sadly.

"With no way to get you out, you could get hurt... I have to do something!"

Cindy laid down on her rock slab that functions as her bed. It was cold, but she didn't care. A gurgle from her stomach told her to empty her crop. She refused with all her might, she would never-

"Cough cough cough"

Cindy's thoughts were interrupted as something forced it's way into her throat from her crop. It felt small, so small that Cindy had to focus to feel it.

"T-Tiny? Is that you in there?"

Inside Cindy's chest, behind a wall of scales, flesh, and muscles, you slowly climbed out of your "Protector's" throat. When she laid down, this had thrown you directly in front of Cindy's esophagus sphincter. You had taken advantage of the situation she was in, and climbed through her sphincter, which was loosened up from all the dry heaving. Now you just needed to hope she didn't swallow you back down...
114111121212112121111.title: Things are chucking up

choices: Climb into it. It feels really nice if you ignore the heat.
Rub Cindy's snout, while shaking your head no. You just can't do it.
1141111212121121211111.content:
As you climbed up Cindy's throat, you began irritating it. This caused Cindy to begin coughing. When she did, you were thrown up and out of her mouth, falling toward her scorched rocky slab. You pull yourself off the slab, just in time to be smothered by Cindy's tongue as she licked you while apologizing over and over.

-----------------------------------------------

Finally, after being licked silly, Cindy took you back to the spring. You cleaned off, got redressed as Cindy swallowed your saliva coated clothes, and got carried by Cindy into her bedroom. She breathed fire on the Slab and laid down on it. You were carefully placed on her belly, which radiated heat naturally, thanks to the magma-like acid inside.

"Man, it has been a day, hasn't it, Tiny? I mean, getting almost eaten like that? And all because of berries. Mmmm, I can still taste 'em. Their flavor, their texture, everything! And you too. Your flavor is amazing for something so small. I almost swallowed you again just to make you mine..."

Cindy's tongue licks her lips as her stomach growls. You laugh at her eagerness nervously. She then looks down at her gut where you are located, and smiles in an embarrassed manner.

"Sorry, Tiny. Ignore the words of a young Charizard."

She leans back and thinks for a second. What if she put you in her maw for the night? Would you care? Only one way to find out...

Cindy looks back at you and sees you looking at her questioningly. She opens her maw to talk but finds that her voice won't work. She calms down and tries again.

"Hey, Tiny. Would you mind sleeping in my maw for the night? It is warmer in there, and I promise not to swallow you in my sleep. What do you say? Please?"

Cindy leaves her maw open next to you. You don't know what to do. You reach out to Cindy's maw and...
1141111212121121211111.title: Welcome back up, Chuck!

11411112121211212111111.content:
...Climb into it. This catches Cindy off guard, as she didn't expect you to be so excepting of her maw. She uses her long tongue to drag you further in her maw. The draconic teeth are worrying if you look at them but Cindy makes sure to keep you safely away from them as you enter. Once you are fully in her mouth, Cindy closes it and leaves you resting on her tongue.

With only a little light coming in through the teeth, you sit up and look around. You are surprised to see that you only take up about two taste buds on her tongue. The rest of her mouth is gigantic! The teeth are all bigger than or just as tall as you, making you feel really... tiny. Suddenly, Cindy's nickname for you makes sense.

You go to stand, which is something you have plenty of room for, when Cindy's tongue shifts, causing you to fall face first on top of it. Before you can get back up, Cindy uses her tongue to squeeze you a little. You yelp in surprise as you're lifted of the ground while being wrapped up in tongue. You laugh and begin fighting back to have a little fun.

Outside, Cindy smiles. She is so glad you decided to do this. She feels all giddy with excitement! She would be spewing flames if not for you being in her mouth.

After around ten minutes passed, you and Cindy got ready to sleep. Cindy tucked you under her tongue as if it were a blanket, and she rested on her belly, with her tail and head tucked closer to her chest.

"Thanks for doing this Tiny. It really means a lot to me. I think you and I could be close friends. See ya in the morning!"

You laughed as her tongue bounced on you as she spoke. When she was done talking, you rubbed her tongue. You felt the same. And with that, you two fell asleep.
11411112121211212111111.title: It's like a damp sauna in here! But mind the teeth

choices: ...Cindy's fire breath shot you up into the air!
114111121212112121111111.content:
Cindy sat up as morning shed light on her mansion, which bled in through the cracks of the mansion walls. After yawning, and scratching her belly, Cindy felt something stir under her tongue. It was you, and although you hadn't woken up yet, you definitely smelled Cindy's morning breath. Cindy scooped you up onto her tongue and extended her tongue out of her mouth. There you slept, tiny as ever. Cindy dropped you in her hand softly and went to start he morning routine. A small drink from the waterfall in the room next to her kitchen, a bath in the hotspring, and finally some breakfast. All while you slept soundly.

So soundly, in fact, that Cindy would switch between holding you comfortably and putting you on her snout. Mostly, you laid on her snout, as she could easily see you there without worrying if you got hurt since her saliva stuck you to her warm scales. As she was "cooking" breakfast, you began to stir a bit and sit up. When you did, you were met with a shock. You weren't in Cindy's maw, but rather on top of her basketball stadium sized snout.

A chuckle below told you that Cindy loved your surprised face. You turned to face her better and gasped. Her eyes were huge! You hadn't really noticed how big they were until now. Two big blue orbs stared right at you. They were friendly, but you were still scared for a moment. Until you saw how beautiful those eyes were.

You smiled and waved at her. She chuckled again.

"Hello there Tiny, how are you this fine morning? Good I hope?"

You nod happily. You try shouting that your wondering why you're not in her mouth, but all she gives you is a confused look. She then pulls a roasted Rattata into view and begins eating it, talking between mouthfuls.

"What are you trying to do there Tiny? Are you trying to tell me something?"

You nod, and after a game of charades, you get her to understand what you're trying to say.

"Oh! Why are you not in my mouth? Well, I had to clean my mouth out. Don't worry, I can tell by that look you're giving that you're wondering how I do that. Well I get some cold spring water from a small waterfall in the water room next to the kitchen. Then I swish it around and use my claws to pick food out from between my teeth. My father taught me how to be clean and respectful, but also not to be a pushover. I had to beat Blanc, my father's butler, in a battle just to so he'd give me the mansion. Oh! Speaking of Blanc, he'll be home this afternoon."

You look at Cindy questioningly. Blanc? Who is that? Just as Cindy finishes her roasted Rattata, she looks at you. She must have read your mind as she starts explaining.

"Oh yeah, I haven't told you about Blanc or my father... sorry about that. I'll explain later when Blanc gets home. Right now..."

Cindy's clawed pinky went up to her mouth.

"... I think I need some help getting this meat out from between my teeth. Maybe I have a stick around here somewhere..."

You think for a second as she begins looking for a stick. Couldn't you just go inside her mouth and fix that? After waving your arms and getting Cindy's attention, you played another game of charades to tell her your idea.

"Hey, that's not a bad idea, Tiny! Yeah, let's do that! You're certainty more tasty than a filthy stick, that's for sure."

Cindy peeled you off of her snout and licked your entire body before placing you on her tongue and retracting it inside her open maw. Inside, you saw a bit of fire appear from behind you. She had closed her maw and you saw her teeth, which were encased in flames!

"Don't worry about the fire, Tiny. I'm using Fire Fang, so you can see better in there."

You nodded. Turning around, you definitely saw the mouth was lit up much brighter then when the maw was closed. The teeth at the back of the maw weren't on fire, weather that was on purpose or not, you had no idea. As you walked closer toward Cindy's back teeth, you noticed that the saliva drenching you was keeping you nice and cool in the hot environment.

Finally, you reached her back teeth and began pulling bone pieces and meat scraps out from between her teeth. It was hard work, but your hands were definitely better at cleaning than any stick she could find.

Outside, Cindy was humming a tune and using Fire Punch to catch her hands on fire. When they were, she began "cooking" some berries for you to eat when you where done in her maw. She could feel you hard at work inside, pulling everything out from between her teeth. Her Fire Fang never extended that far back and was glad you were willing to help.

After you were done with her left teeth, you walked across the tongue, which was eager for a taste, and got to work on her right teeth. However, you weren't paying attention, as pulling on a bone chunk lodged in between two teeth, proved to be a bad idea.

Cindy's head shot up in pain as her teeth flared red with flames! She roared as loud as she could, letting out a blast of flame from her wide open maw! You, before getting set on fire, dove under her tongue as the flames shot by. It kept you from being hit completely by the fire, but some of it still hit you. Luckily, Cindy's saliva kept you from any harm, but you definitely felt the heat!

When Cindy lowed her maw back down, she gasped.

"TINY! ARE YOU OK!? Ohnonononono!!!"

You quickly began patting her tongue and rubbing it to show you were fine.

"Tiny!? Oh, you are ok, phew! Sorry about that, here I'll get you out and we can try something else, instead."

You lightly kick the tongue to show that you don't like that plan, you can be more careful and get the job done!

"Oh? You want to try to help anyway? Well, ok... Just try and be careful. As you saw, I don't handle mouth pain too well."

With that, you go back to work, much more carefully this time. Outside, Cindy rubs her bottom right jaw and sets back to cooking her berries, which luckily had landed on the table in front of her.

As you slowly get to work cleaning between Cindy's last two farthest teeth, you take note of how close you are to her throat, one wrong move and it's yesterday's berry dinner all over again. You slowly reach out and pull on a very thin bone. Little did you know, this bone's tip was wedged into a crack on the tooth to your right. Just as you pull the bone free, you know you made a mistake.

Cindy's maw shoots open and points toward the ceiling again! You gasp and scramble toward the tongue again, but you were too slow as...
114111121212112121111111.title: Early morning routine

1141111212121121211111111.content:
Just as you get to the tongue to hide under it, you slip in a glob of saliva and go sliding down the tongue instead. Just as you fall into the throat, a blast of fire shoots out of a tunnel you hadn't even seen! Luckily, you passed through the throat before the fire blasted through. Charizards must have fire producing glands in their neck somewhere.

Soon you're squeezed into Cindy's crop. You finally hear the flames she was breathing die down up above. You waited a second before doing anything, but when that second was over you mad sure to announce your presence within Cindy's body. The moment you did, you heard her stomach bubble below and felt her hand rest upon her belly.

"Oh, no... did I swallow you again by accident? Wait... MY FIRE BREATH! ARE YOU OK? ARE YOU BURNT!?"

You quickly begin to rub her insides in an attempt to not get her worked up. It works and Cindy's crop walls descend on you comfortingly.

"I'll take that as 'you're fine'? Well if that's the case, then I'll bring you back up here in a bit. My throat is so dry and crisp from all that fire breathing. You can wait for just a little bit inside me, can't you?"

You rub in agreement and wait. After about thirty minutes or so, you doze off to sleep.

When you wake up, you are floating on a berry in a sea of saliva and water. There are other berries as well in here, but you're just surprised to see how full Cindy's crop was. It wasn't extending out in any way, just full. You nibble off the berry you're on and rub a nearby stomach wall. Upon doing so, a loud snoring echoed through the chamber. Cindy was fast asleep.

You wondered what time of day it had to be for her to be sleeping. Did she forget you were inside her? Did she just fall asleep for a nap? You had no idea, but you needed to find out!

Just as you were about to try and wake Cindy up, the crop began shifting. Cindy was asleep, which meant that her crop would empty into her stomach! You screamed as you fell, until suddenly...
1141111212121121211111111.title: Accidental decent 2: electric boogaloo!

11411112121211212111111111.content: You landed inside Cindy's stomach acids. The liquid was so hot you felt your skin melting off! You swim upwards to try and take a breath. You succeed, but it doesn't matter, as you're already mostly digested. You struggle for life for a bit longer before passing out. Your body is then broken down completely, becoming fat on the base of Cindy's tail.
11411112121211212111111111.title: Yeowch!

11411112121211212111111112.content:
A loud and heavy burp from Cindy's stomach sends you flying right back into her mouth. Once there, the snores are definitely louder. However, this only means that escape is easier. You hop out if Cindy's maw to see that the sun is setting and that Cindy is nowhere near the mansion. She's still within the mountainous ring, but far from home.

You look around at the area nearby. Cindy seems to have fallen asleep rather abruptly as she's laying stomach down on cold dirt. One hand in front of her as if she had been protecting herself from an attack. Behind you a small stream leads into a barely noticeable cavern in the mountain. An underground pond perhaps? Assuming it doesn't go straight through the mountain.

You look up at the sky again to see that it's almost completely dark out. You run over to Cindy and try waking her up, but nothing works. A cold breeze blows by and your teeth begin to chatter. You crawl back into Cindy's maw for warmth for the night. Nothing you can do until morning, unfortunately. You curl up under Cindy's tongue, give a few friendly pats to it, and then fall asleep.

-----

You wake up some time later. After rubbing your eyes you look around to see that you are still inside Cindy's maw. She seems to be awake as you feel her body shake slightly with each step she takes. You rub her tongue happily as if it were a happy Lillipup. When you're done, it tackles you eagerly running up and down your chest and face. When it's done tasting you, the tongue scoops you up on top of it and leads you outside of the now wide open Charizard maw.

After your eyes adjust to the light, you see that the tongue has deposited you onto Cindy's snout. You see the mansion off in the distance in front of you. It seems like Cindy was walking home when you woke up.

You turn around to see Cindy's giant light blue eyes looking at you innocently. You never noticed that her eyes sparkle so beautifully in the sunlight. Wait, why are thinking about that? That sounds like something someone would say if they found their "true love" as movies put it. And you're not in love with Cindy. You can't be! She's a Pokemon, you can't be in love with her! Not to mention that she is a giant dragon capable of eating you in one bite!

Suddenly you're pulled from your thoughts as she begins talking. Luckily the saliva you've been sleeping in since last night is keeping you stuck to her snout instead of flying away with one opening of her maw.

"Hey there Tiny. I'm glad you're safe. When I woke up this morning, I was worried that I had digested you. Imagine my surprise when I found out that you were sleeping in my mouth."

She licked her lips as a sign that you still taste great, licking you in the process. Then her face went serious as she continued talking.

"Sorry about my sudden nap last night Tiny, it wasn't meant to happen. You see I was..."

Cindy explained that as you slept in her crop yesterday, she went off on a hunt. She would've stayed home and had some left over Rattata in her fridge, but she was bored and needed something to do. However, when she came across a strange Pokemon that she had never encountered before, things took a turn for the worse.

"You see, all I wanted to do was help them out because they looked like they were having trouble with the water or something. When I showed up, I was blasted with some sort of hypnotic move. I tried to protect myself, but... I'm sorry for putting you in serious danger. I forget that not all Pokemon are nice Pokemon. Especially the Noibats and Noiverns up on Shade Mountain. You know, the place where I found you a few days ago. They suuuck."

As Cindy finishes that drawn out word. You hear a creaking behind you. You were so focused on the story Cindy was telling that you forgot about the mansion. It seems like you two have finally managed to get to it.

"In fact, I don't think I ever explained to you why...I...Was not expecting this...."

You gasp as you see that the mansion has been quite thoroughly cleaned on the inside. Sure there are still black spots from burn marks and holes in the building caused by wear and tear through the years, but the floor is the place with the most noticeable changes. Where once there was trash, leaves and other miscellaneous stuff, there is now clean marble and polished granite.

"Oh crap."

Oh Crap? That can't be good...

???: "Young master Cindy? Is that you?"

Cindy quickly grabs you and starts looking for a place to hide you. You look at her nervously. Why does she need to hide you? Who is it that she's hiding you from?

Before you have a chance to even think about more questions, Cindy quickly shoves you in her mouth and swallows you down rather roughly. As you're being squeezed down Cindy's throat, you hear Cindy begin talking.

Cindy: "Yeah, Blanc, it's me, sorry I wasn't home when you showed up."

Outside, Cindy had just swallowed you. Your bulge was still in her throat when a Pokemon came around the corner out of the hallway. It was a very old looking Blastoise.

Blanc: "It doesn't bother me at all my Lord. Though, if you don't mind me asking, what were you doing? Am I to prepare for a new addition in the family tree? Your father will be so happy!"

Cindy: "What? No! No, no of course not. Well maybe. But not in the way you're thinking. I gotta get to my room now. Got stuff I gotta do. It was great talking to you though!"

Cindy runs off past her father's butler and in to the hall he came out of. After going down it and into her room, she swiftly closes the door behind her. She presses her back against it and slides down to sit on the floor.

Cindy: "It's a good thing I don't have hair or fur, because if I did, I would have pulled it out years ago."

Cindy then hears a gurgle from her stomach. She rests a hand on her slightly chubby belly and begins rubbing it.

"Give me a minute Tiny, I'll get you out of there, somewhat cleaned up, and explain what's going on. Just, give me a minute to think."
11411112121211212111111112.title: Cleaning up the Plot part 1

114111121212112121111111121.content:
About ten minutes later, Cindy has spit you out, cleaned you up with an old cloth, and sat you down to talk to you. That only took about five minutes, the rest was spent with her pacing back and forth in front of you.

Cindy: "Where to begin, where to begin?"

You would shout up to her that it's fine and just calm down, but you already tried that and it worked just as fine as any other time you tried getting her to hear your voice. Which is to say, not very well.

Cindy: "Oh! I got it!"

You sigh in relief. Cindy turns back to you and sits down on her bed beside you. You were far enough away from where she sat to not worry about being squished, but it still made your heart skip a beat when she sat so close to you.

Cindy: "Alright, so look. When I was a little girl, my father would tell me stories..."

Cindy goes on to talk about how her father and his trainer used to live here. One day, however, the trainer got sick and died, leaving his home to the only family he had left, his Charizard.

The Charizard, Cindy's father, went on to establish a nest within the mansion and area within the circle of mountains. This area being where you and Cindy have spent the last few days.

So far, you kinda knew most of this stuff. But you weren't about to tell her that. Not that she could hear you anyway. What she said next though, was interesting.

Her father went on to leave the nest and flew for days up to the North, following the flying type Pokemon. When he got there, he met Cindy's mother, another Charizard. She had been wild her whole life, while Cindy's father was still new to being wild.

The two had chemistry together, as Cindy's father was tough and stern, yet soft when you got to know him. Cindy's mother was beautiful and competitive, but didn't really act nice to anybody.

The two would work together to help Pokemon and people in need. One time, they saved a Wartortle from a fishing boat. That Wartortle later evolved and became Cindy's father's butler.

A while later, the three Pokemon all took off South to end up right back here. Eventually, Cindy was born and became the heir to her father's estate. Which meant the mansion and the area within the mountains.

Cindy: "Any questions so far?"

You had questions but when you went to say them you remembered she couldn't hear you.

Cindy: "Hahaha, I'm messing with you. You can ask Blanc questions about that time. I wasn't born for most of it, and when I was, I was too young."

You nod in understanding and gesture for her to continue.

Cindy: "So anyway..."

Cindy went on to grow up in the mansion. Her mother wanted her to be raised as she was, in the wild on her own, while Cindy's father wanted her to be raised in the mansion, where he could protect her. In the end, they settled on an idea they were both ok with. That being that they would train her to hunt, defend herself, and cook. Afterward, they would go back North and leave Blanc to watch over Cindy here at the mansion.

When Cindy evolved into Charmeleon, her mother demanded she get a mate so as to continue the bloodline. Cindy's father disagreed. He wanted her to wait until she evolved again to worry about that. However, Blanc heard this piece of information, and ran with it. He encouraged her to get a mate to please her parents. Since then, Cindy was always hounded for not having one.

However, last year, she evolved once more and was convinced that the Noiverns on Shade Mountain would accept her. But they didn't. They mocked her for not knowing that they didn't share the same egg group. In her sadness, she went down to a river and wept. However, she smelled something terrible. When she went to investigate, she found you snoring in that hole.

Cindy: "And well, you know the rest from there. But now you know why I hid you from Blanc. If he saw you... He would tell my father and both my parents would try to eat you just to get you out of the picture. Yeah, I'd be making that face to. I would be so disappointed if they digested you and I didn't, after all. Hahaha! Your face! Anyway, that's why I have to explain to him who you are first. That being, a friend, nothing... nothing else."

Cindy almost sounded sad with that last part. Did she worry that she would always be alone? You pat the base of her tail as a way of trying to cheer her up.

Cindy: "Thanks Tiny."

She reaches down and picks you back up. Once you're back up to her eye level, she licks you cutely.

Cindy: "Well, Blanc won't be willing to listen until later tonight. Which means we got time to kill. Wanna do something fun?"

You nod vigorously. You could use some fun right about now.

Cindy: "That's what I wanted to hear! Let's see... Ok. I got two ideas. Since you've been in there so much, you can explore inside me for a couple hours. Or, we could go find out what happened with that Pokemon last night. Whatever you choose first, just know that I want to do the other one later."

Cindy: "So which is it? Explore? Or Investigate?"
114111121212112121111111121.title: Cleaning up the Plot part 2

1141111212121121211111112.content:
As you made it to the tongue, the bone piece you pulled went flying straight toward the back of your head. Following closely behind was a wave of fire. As the bone hit you, you were knocked out cold as the flames caught up with you and shot you across the room. Due to Cindy's maw being angled so high, you went soaring straight out of the kitchen and into her waterfall room.

-----

Some time passed as the small trickle of water acted as a river taking you right out of the mansion and washing you into a stream right next to the mansion. The stream washed you ashore miles downstream, passed the ring of mountains thanks to a near underwater cavern. Here, there was a somewhat marshy delta consisting of many small islands in the middle of the stream emptying out into a large gulf, and from there, the Ocean.

You were lucky enough to have survived and be washed up on the islands. There, a shadow stood over you, picked you up and carried you away...

The question is, what Pokemon did the shadow belong to?
1141111212121121211111112.title: Going... Going... Gone! Homerun!

114111121212112121111112.content:
Long after you and Cindy had fallen asleep, Cindy's rocky bed became really cold. Though she could handle the cold rock just fine, she began to feel uncomfortable and rolled in her sleep. Causing Cindy to lay on her back instead of her belly. While laying on her back, her mouth opened widely, allowing her tongue to hang out.

Inside Cindy's open mouth, the saliva inside caused you to come free of your position under the tongue. This caused you to slid directly into Cindy's throat. With the assistance of gravity, you began to slide all the way down her esophagus, and into her crop. After another thirty minutes went by, Cindy shifted again. This time, she laid on her belly again.

The sudden movement of Cindy's body caused you to slid straight into her gurgling stomach. The heat and steam from inside would have woken you up, if your body hadn't already adjusted to the heat of the crop above. You slid right into the bubbling acid as you slept. You didn't have time to even process the wet burning on your body before you were dragged under completely.

-------------------------------------------------

In the morning, after a restless night, Cindy woke up and stretched before smacking her lips and scratching her belly. She then burped a very loud burp that left saliva and drool all over the floor.

"Heh, excuse me Tiny. I'm sorry you had to get caught up in the middle of that. I don't know what I even ate to burp that big anyway! Here, let me get you out of my mouth."

After licking around in her maw a while, Cindy realized that you weren't in there.

"Funny... Tiny! Where are you!?"

Suddenly a gurgle from her gut rang out in response. She looked down at her belly for a moment before it clicked. She had digested you in her tossing and turning last night.

Worst. Morning. Ever.
114111121212112121111112.title: Troubles for little Tiny

11411112121211212111112.content:
...You retract your hand back in fear. The memories of Cindy's crop and stomach flood back to you. However, Cindy still has her maw open expectantly. You instead rub her maw with a scared smile on your face as she looks down at you.

"Oh! Oh no! I scared you with your trip into me earlier didn't I? I'm so sorry, Tiny! Here, you can sleep over here so you feel more secure!"

Cindy then got up from her bed and walked over to a broken fish tank. Inside were all those leaves from the berries earlier! She must have moved them here for you as a bed... but then why did she want you over there in the first place? Did Cindy think you would agree to sleeping in her maw? If so, then she must have set this up as a plan B...

"There ya go Tiny, a little nest of your own. If you need anything, there's an old Chingling statue that was in this thing. I set it right over here, to the left-your right-of the nest, ok?"

You nod. You can tell by the look on her face and the tone of her voice, that Cindy is upset you chose leaves instead of her. Before you can say or do anything, not that she could hear you, Cindy gives you a lick along your belly to your face and smiles.

"Goodnight Tiny! See ya in morning!"

And with that she turns back around, resets her bed on fire, and lays down on the heated rock. Cindy's head is facing away from you, and you hear a wiser of some sobbing, before it turns into snoring.

You lay on the leaves, a thinner leaf acting as your blanket. The only light in the room currently being Cindy's tail flame, which barely lit up your area. You closed your eyes feeling bad about what you did. You just couldn't control your fear.

The next day, you woke up still covered in the leaves you had fallen asleep in. You get up and stretch before looking at Cindy's bed and noticing her gone. Where was she? You walk over to the Chingling bell statue and ring it.

Before too long, you hear a shout from the hall.

"Just a minute! I'm putting breakfast on! If you want down, just jump! There's a pile of leaves that should cushion your fall!"

You look down the side of where you are. Sure enough, a pile of leaves are set there. You look at the gap, and wonder if you could even make it without getting hurt? Before you can change your mind, your left hand slips and you fall toward the leaf pile. You close your eyes, but when you don't feel wind whipping your body you open them. You're so small and light that you're slowly floating down to the leaves. When you land, you shout triumphantly, pumping your fist into the air! You then get up and run over to the doorway. A hallway goes from left to right. A smell of cooked berries fills your nostrils. You decide to try and find the kitchen, but... which way is it?
11411112121211212111112.title: Really? Now you hurt her feelings... Jerk...

1141111212121121211112.content:
Cindy laid on her rocky slab. Her mouth was oozing saliva as you climbed her throat, making it feel dry and agitated. Cindy refused to swallow anything until you were back in her mouth. However, at some point, she stopped paying attention to you, and so she couldn't feel you in her throat anymore. Because of this, she assumed you were in her mouth. She leaned up and went to grab you, when suddenly, she began choking on the saliva that had built up in her mouth.

Inside Cindy's throat, you could see small waterfalls of saliva cascading down the sides of her throat. As long as you avoided those, you were sure you could make it. Suddenly, just as your hand made contact with Cindy's tongue, she leaned up. This caused all the saliva in her mouth to wash down her throat and take you along with it! Determined to live, you grabbed ahold of the opening to her lungs, just to avoid falling.

Cindy cleared her throat with an "Ahem," and breathed out a small flame from her mouth. She then licked around her maw, searching for you. She didn't manage to find anything, and suddenly heard a pleased gurgle from her stomach.

"Oh no! I didn't swallow him back down, did I?"

You meanwhile sat on a berry overlooking an acid lake. There was no way out from here, suddenly the stomach walls began to move from side to side. Cindy was rubbing her stomach and knew you were in there. You placed a hand on the stomach wall nearest to you and rubbed it back. Then a gurgle gave out as your berry sunk below the surface. You swam around for only a second before the acid dragged you under too.

Outside, Cindy licked her lips and rubbed her belly.

"I'm so sorry Tiny. I thought you were safe in my mouth. I will always remember you when I rub my stomach."
1141111212121121211112.title: Oh, no. You lose! Game over, man. Game over

114111121212112121112.content:
"-then I'm really sorry, but I'm tired. With any luck, you might survive! Goodnight little guy, I hope you aren't actually in there..."

With that, Cindy walks off down the hallway and into a destroyed bedroom. The bed has been crushed by a giant rock long ago. After shooting fire at the rock from her mouth, Cindy curls up onto the slab. She then empties her crop into her stomach and places a hand on her belly. In one last attempt to make sure you aaren'tin there, she jiggles her belly a little, but only feels berries and Magikarp.

"Guess that settles that."

Cindy smiles, closes her eyes and sleeps.

You however, had just barely heard her words to you over the gurgles below. When things start shaking again, you expected to be release. Instead, you heard fire pass by overhead after that, habit more shaking. You were just about to shout and ask what was happening, when the crop squeezed you and the berries into the stomach.

You expected to be digested instantly, but instead you swam up, got on top a berry and noticed that your skin was peeling off from the amount of heat inside the stomach. Cindy's mouth had been hot, her throat hotter, and her crop even hotter than that. But Cindy's stomach felt like it was as hot as the sun. You could tell you were already dehydrated before, and this heat made it even worse.

Suddenly, the stomach wall pushed you and the berry into the acid, squeezing you. When you surfaced, you heard Cindy say something else before the heat finally hit you too hard, and you sunk below the acid...

-------------------------------------------------

Cindy woke up and yawned loudly. She got up and went to the kitchen, after eating a berry or two for breakfast, Cindy began to look for you. She looked around for you for most of the day before she felt the call to nature. When she was done with her business she turned to cover the whole she had dug, when she noticed something. A tiny skeleton among the waste.
114111121212112121112.title: Bet that Noibat is looking better right about now

choices: "Don't worry Tiny, I didn't forget about you."
11411112121211212112.content:
A gurgle from Cindy's gut, reminds her of what she did. She had picked up your berry by mistake and swallowed you down. She giggled and rubbed her belly softly. If she focused really hard, she could feel you in her crop.

"Oh, you feel great in there! Sorry about eating you, I just couldn't help myself! Don't worry about being digested, I promise not to send you any further. Now, I got some tidying up to do if I'm going to have you stay here. So if you need me, just struggle and I'll see what's wrong. In the meantime, try to relax, get some sleep, or something. I'll let you out in a couple hours when it's time for bed, ok? Ok."

Inside Cindy, you listened to her body around you. It was nice and soothing. Suddenly, You could hear Cindy talking. It was hard to hear from the noises inside her but you picked up most of what she said. You decided that since she knew you were inside her, you would take her advice and take a nap. You snuggle into the flesh next to you and begin to fall asleep. As Cindy's stomach gurgles below.

Cindy went around the mansion picking up things and cleaning off cobwebs. Every once in a while she would squeeze a few berries into her stomach and make sure you were ok. Then she would continue cleaning and tidying up.

Thanks to her father's butler Blanc, the place was usually tidy. Blanc normally kept the mansion in a pseudo-nice-looking manner. However, Blanc had left to fish for the weekend and wouldn't be back until tomorrow evening.

This caused the mansion to go into disarray due to the fact that Cindy didn't usually clean up after herself. Which, now that she met you, she was working hard to fix. Cindy didn't want you to have to worry about objects on the floor if you wanted to walk around the mansion, after all. A couple hours passed and the sun finally went down.

"Phew! All of this hard work sure is a bunch of... hard work! Well I guess it's time for bed. Yawn! Eh, yeah, it definitely is."

Cindy walked into an old room where a big slab of rock had crushed a former human bed. Cindy breathed fire on it to warm it up, lied down on top of it, and was about to close her eyes...
11411112121211212112.title: Netflix and Chill, but without the Netflix.

choices: A skeleton of your former self.
Your sleeping form on a Magicarp bone.
114111121212112121122.content:
"Yawn! Ugh, I am so... tired... I'm just gonna... rest my eyes a bit... before... before... zzzz."

Inside Cindy's gut, the crop emptied itself into the stomach. Luckily for you, you stayed asleep as Cindy's stomach deposited you on a Magicarp bone. The stomach gurgled around you as you slept, slowly dessolving the bone you rested on.

In her sleep, Cindy would burp every once in a while. Hours passed as her stomach digested berries and bones. Until the sun came up that is. Cindy opened her eyes, yawned, and scratched her belly, before remembering that she had fallen asleep with you inside her.

Cindy gasped and jumped up. She began to try and feel you inside her crop. When that failed, she tried the same thing for her stomach. After a bit of worrying, she felt your form inside her. She gasped as she felt...
114111121212112121122.title: Talk about early breakfast!

1141111212121121211221.content:
There was nothing in her stomach but your skeleton.

No really that's it. Sorry if you want to know what Cindy did when she felt your body. But you're dead. For you, this is...
1141111212121121211221.title: Yikes, you'll feel that one in the morning.

1141111212121121211222.content:
...Your body, snoozing away the morning.

Cindy was both glad and horrified. On one hand, you were alive, but on the other, you were trapped inside her Stomach. Once something fell in her stomach, it didn't leave.

Cindy continued to rub her stomach. Her friend was right under her scales, but she could never see him again. She let loose a tear that fell on her belly, before sizzling up almost instantly from the heat within.

Around this time, you wake up covered in a mixture of saliva, acid, and sweat, especially sweat. Looking around shows that Cindy passed you into her stomach while you slept. You are about to freak out, when you hear a distant sobbing come from up above the stomach sphincter, which is high above you.

"Tiny? You're a-awake? I'm really *sniff* sorry I d-did this to you. Maybe one day y-you'll *sob* come to forgive me?"

A big hand print outline appears on the stomach wall next to you. You place your palm on top of it. You do forgive her.

"T-Tiny!? You... you forgive me... I don't deserve it! I really don't! B-But... thank you. I think you'll be digested when that bone is done dissolving. Which will be sometime today I'm sure. I-I'm... sorry I dragged you into this. I thought that I could take care of you in there but..."

You rub her stomach wall. 'It's okay! I don't blame you, really!' You try to convey your thoughts, but you don't know how to. Suddenly, Cindy begins talking again.

"Wait! I can eat more fish Pokemon! Or even just anything with bones! That will bye you some time! Oh and I can drink water to make it less hot in there! Tiny, hold on! You're not going to dye on me yet!!!

You gasp. You didn't know you meant this much to Cindy. Suddenly everything starts sloshing everywhere as Cindy flies down the hall to the kitchen. You cling to your rapidly digesting fish bone. Then the acid sprays everywhere as Cindy lands. You get hit by a drop or two, but nothing too serious, it only burns what was left of your clothes away.

You sigh in relief, having survived the acid bath. You then notice a sound of running water. A waterfall? The sphincter above you then opens as nice, cold, river water flows through and into the stomach. As the water hit the acid, it hissed and produced smoke that began to rise to the top of the stomach. The glow of the magma-like acid quickly began to dim until the stomach was just bright enough to see the other side of it from where you were. The slow bubbling of the acid was now left to a very slow churn.

You cautiously dipped a toe into the acid. A slight tingle could be felt, as if your toe had been dunked into some soda. You smiled and jumped into the tingling liquid. You swam around until you heard Cindy laughing above.

"You feel like you're having a good time in my belly."

She poked her belly with a claw, causing the whole organ to ripple a bit and the liquid to slosh. The sloshing caused a bit of the glow to diminish even more. But you didn't even notice as you swam in the sloshing liquid.

"That should give you an hour or two of safety until I eat. And don't try to go any lower! Not that I think you'll fit, you're still too big to go further down without having the meat melted off your bones I think. But just so you know, if you go any further, I can't keep my body from treating you like any other chunk of meat. And I can't bring you back up either. I tried once when I had first swallowed a living prey. They were shouting in pain so much, that when I tried to release them from guilt, it didn't work. No matter how small you are, my sphincter leading to my crop is one way. And that way is down. If you were still in my crop I could've brought you out with some effort, but you're not... I think you'll just have to live inside my stomach for a while. At least until I think of a way to get you out."

Cindy stopped talking to burp. The smoke at the top of the stomach exiting through and into the crop as it wasn't solid like you were. You smiled at her burp. Cindy's voice made it clear that she was still trying to take care of you from all the way in her stomach. You rubbed her stomach wall a bit more, causing another burp out of her. Another poke from Cindy, however, sent you under the liquid.

"Take that for making me gassy you pain in the gut! Now, get to the center, because I know you're probably thirsty. Her comes some more water!"

You see a small bit of water fall from above. You really don't want to, but you are thirsty so you open your mouth and drink a bit of it. It tastes like saliva, but you'll take what you can get. After you're done, you swim over to a wall, pat it, and get back on your bone.

Outside, Cindy feels your pats and sees this a way to tell her you done with the water. She closes her crop back up, and opens the years old refrigerator. Inside, sat a few small cryogonal, Pokemon known for looking like snow flakes, and asked them to hand her a few Rattata for breakfast. They comply happily and Cindy takes the Rattata with a thank you.

Closing the fridge, Cindy rubs her stomach and licks her lips. Inside that very stomach, you cling to your bony raft as the rubbing causes waves to appear. You cling tighter to your bone, but the waves die off quickly. Your glad your friend takes care of you while inside the most dangerous part of her.

"Look out below! Here comes breakfast! Hope you're ready!"

Cindy shoves a full Rattata into her mouth, swallowing it down easily. She then looks down to her belly. She's still worried about you being in her most dangerous part of her body. The very core of it. She leans down, licks her belly lovingly, and whispers a few words.

"Be safe in there, okay?"

Cindy then swallows two more Rattata to hold her over later. Then she goes outside, spreads her wings and flies off to hunt. All while, you swim around the Rattata inside her. Unknowingly, helping her stomach digest the food while the top of the acids have been neutralized.
1141111212121121211222.title: Home sweet home

choices: To be continued... (Please leave open for me)
11411112121211212112221.content:
Later, Cindy returned home a little after 2:00 pm. She held a ball of leaves with berries inside, and a few small Pokemon in her stomach and crop. After walking inside the mansion, she noticed a smell. A smell she remembered well. It was the smell of the Ocean! She looked around the mansion seeing her dishes fully clean, and her bed freshly polished. The cleaning from yesterday must not have been good enough as she saw Blanc on all fours blasting the wall and floor with water. A square sponge hanging out of his mouth.

Cindy: "Blanc! You're home! I can't believe you got here so early! What are you doing here? I thought you were fishing?"

Blanc: "Calmness, Lord Cindy, I ran out of room in my baskets for anymore fish. So I decided to surprise you with an early visit. Now, if I may, Lord Cindy, what made you clean the hallways, hmm? Did your father stop by while I was gone? Or did you have another Charizard over? Should I be looking forward to tiny Lords?

Cindy: "A male Charizard? Here? Ha! You're hilarious! The only thing nearby is the Noiverns up Shade Mountain. And they never come down into my father's valley anyway. In fact-"

Blanc: "So did you try to talk to the Noiverns? I'm sure the leader's son would accept your hand in mating."

Cindy: "Yes I did. But they weren't interested in me and threw me out. Which- "

Cindy brought a hand to her belly. She would drink water down for you as soon as she was done. However, before she could finish, Blanc interrupted her again.

Blanc: "Threw you out? Well, I'm sorry to hear that Lord Cindy."

Cindy: "I'm not, trust me. I heard a Noibat torture it's prey like some kind of monster! Anyway, when I was up there, I found a small creature up there."

Blanc: "A small creature? A Joltic perhaps? Or Ribombee?"

Cindy: "No, not a Pokemon! Sorta like... a Machop or Gardevoire. But not a Pokemon, and really tiny. Like prey for tiny Pokemon even!"

Blanc: "Oh? Well, what did it do?"

Cindy: "Well that's the thing..."

------------------------------------------------

Cindy: "-And now it's just sort of in there, trapped."

Blanc: "I see... And has Tiny moved since this morning?"

Cindy: "Yeah, but I think it's asleep. They can't handle extremely high temperatures, and my stomach is full of that. Do you know of a way to get him out of me?

Blanc: Hmm, I don't think I do. My deepest apologies. I believe he's just a part of your digestive system now. Like when Pidgey eat stones to help grind up Metapods. He is there to help your body process foods."

Cindy: "Huh? How would he do that?"

Blanc: "By swimming around when you drink water. I remember you when you were but a humble Charmander, not liking water due to it giving you indigestion. But did you get that earlier? When you drank the stream water from the water room right there?"

Cindy: "No, I never felt that. I was too worried about Tiny to even really think about the water... ARE YOU SAYING HE HELPS MY STOMACH DIGEST STUFF WHEN I HAVE INDIGESTION?"

Blanc: "Tis' only but a theory. One heavyhanded with salt, my lord"

Cindy placed both hands on her belly and started to rub. You helped out her digestive system without knowing it! Or maybe you did? Either way, she was glad you were in there. Though she wished she could get you out from time to time.

------------------------------------------------

Later that day, you swam around inside your flooded home. It seems that, according to what Cindy told you, you were now a vital piece in her digestive system. Another "body part" almost. One she never knew she needed. You were excited for this, it meant being in here had been a good thing the whole time! You were happy to swim around in her belly broth and stir up some burps for your protector turned predator.

Outside, Cindy sat in her hot spring. She was enjoying the feeling you made her stomach feel when you swam around inside. She released a stream of fire from her mouth in joy. Then turned toward her gut and began licking it all over, which you felt inside. She rubbed her belly lovingly as she burped loudly.

Later, she drank more water for the night, heated her bed up, gave one final lick to her belly for the night and crawled onto her slab to rest. It had been quite the day. She tucked her tail and head toward her chest and uttered one final sentence.

"I love you, Tiny"

You yawned inside her belly. Resting inside a Rattata skull. You poked your hand out of an eye socket and rubbed her stomach wall.

'I love you too.'
11411112121211212112221.title: Then they all lived happily ever after... Right?

114111121212112121122211.content:
And just like that, you were integrated into a Charizard's body. Seems like a good ending with a rocky beginning, ending with a great friendship, maybe even more?

But what happens now? Well it's up to your imagination. Maybe you get out one day and you and Cindy love each other forever! Maybe you're stuck in there and Cindy marries a Noivern (I know that Charizards can't breed with Noiverns, but Cindy doesn't. She's scared of a relationship and won't tell anyone). Maybe you get digested and Cindy is sad, or maybe she doesn't notice the extra nutrients you give?

My point is, in this ending, you get to come up with whatever endings you want. But this is the end for you and Cindy for now. If you're not ok with that, and want me to continue, then just wait until I come back and do the other option on the last page. Maybe I've already done it by now?

Anyway, this is...
114111121212112121122211.title: That's all folks!

You shivered as she stepped toward you, each footfall feeling like a small earthquake to you. You felt the urge to run as she reached towards you, but stood your ground. As she picked you up, you noticed...

So I decided to take you with me to keep you safe from dangers. And besides, telling you the truth, I am kinda lonely..."
she says sighing " However, little guy" she says smiling "what do you want to do now?"

Determination to keep living.

Mew smirks.
"Really? And who is going to stop me?" she rhetorically asks. She giggles.
"You're all mine, human!" she adds, giggling again.

You sweat drop as you realize that rage will get you nowhere. You must pick your words carefully. You might just convince Mew to keep you... even better, she might even let you go if you can convince her!

"... May be," you respond as her tail moves around, throwing you back and forth in midair.
"... I may be all yours, alright. And, yes, I can't do anything against you," you say.
"But is this what you legendaries do? You eat weaker living beings just for fun? Or is it something only you do?"

Mew giggles loudly.
"Why? D'You think I've met another shrunken human such as yourself before? This is an opportunity!" she says cheerfully, like your life is no big deal.

You start to grow irritated again.
"An opportunity? To end my life for no reason?!" you shout, exasperated, before shaking your head.
"I even thought you were nice at first!" you exclaim.

Mew's smirk grows even wider on her face.
"You thought I was nice?" she says.

Then, without any warning, Mew's tail, still coiled around you, starts to move closer to her... closer to her mouth!

The giantess' lips start to part as you approach them, to the point that the hot air within the giant cavern gently blows in your face, filling you with dread again as you eyes the insides of the cave that will probably lead you to your death.

Giant, pearly-white teeth shine sinisterly, almost as if eager to receive you; a giant, red carpet which wiggles in anticipation.

And, last but not least, that dark abyss that is Mew's throat, which would inevitably lead you to her esophagus, then into your final destination: her stomach.

The tail holding you moves a bit closer, Mew's breathing grows faster.

Still unwilling to die, you do the only thing you can think of: struggling.

Sure, Mew is currently hovering in midair, and if you manage get free, you would fall down.

That would mean you'd be reduced to a red stain onto the ground, but, it's less humiliating than the alternative, right?

Sadly, all your struggles turn out to be pointless. The tail is too strong. That doesn't keep you from trying, though.

You're moved a bit closer to the mouth. And, when you think it is over for you, something unexpected happens.

Mew starts to giggle. Then, her giggling turns into laughter as she drops onto the ground, her tail moving away from her mouth, holding you in midair.

You look at the laughing legendary below, who shoots a teasing look.
"You've got fire in your belly, little guy!" Mew exclaims cheerfully.
"When was the last time I've had this kind of fun?" she laughs.

Your mouth opens shut.

Was she just messing with you?

You find that the tail is starting to descend. You are gently dropped onto Mew's belly as she rises her head up, a smile spreading across her face.

"That was fun!" she exclaims cheerfully.

"Y-You... y-you won't eat me...?" you timidly ask. Mew shakes her head.
"Look. It's true, you're small - and tasty - but I'm all alone - and really, really bored," she says, putting particular emphasis on the word ‘bored’.

"In the same time, you're shrunken, helpless and need someone to take care of you,"

You get back on your feet as you stand on Mew's furry belly. You have an idea of what she's talking about.

And you don't like it too much.

"What are you trying to say...?" you ask, even though you exactly know what she's talking about.

Mew smiles.
"I'm saying - we should stick together. We can solve each other's problems," she suggests.

You go quiet as you ponder your answer.

It was all true - you are shrunken, helpless and completely alone in a place where wild pokemon would make a nice snack out of you.

Mew just offered her help... but what you have just been put through left you comprehensibly uneasy with being around the pink legendary.

"So? What's your choice, human?" Mew asks.
"I mean, given your situation, it's not like you have a better alternative. Or would you prefer being alone?" she asks.

She had a point.

You remain silent for a couple more minutes, before finally making your decision.
