Will he take me somewhere else?
114222222122.content:
You closed your eyes and waited for the end...but instead, you felt pressure under your chin and looked up to see Mewtwo smiling at you.

"I will help you." He said gently. "Come with me and I will aid you in becoming a normal size." He flicked his paw and a bubble surrounded you, glowing light purple. Taking the bubble in his paw, Mewtwo flew off through the air...
114222222122.title: Oh boy, please just get it over with...

choices: Yes (Hey look at me, you silly Pokemon)
1142222222.title: Psychic Birds of DOOM! (OK not really)

11422222222.content: How about slowpoke or its evos?
11422222222.title: Slow Psychics

choices: It decides to hunt something else
11422222222221.content:
You wake up to see an enormous Lugia towering over you. You gasp, the Lugia appears so elegant for such a large Pokemon. You then notice Lugia appears to be smiling at you. You don't know why, but just looking at Lugia appears to calm you.

You then hear Lugia's stomach begin to rumble, you immediately flinch expecting the Lugia's beak to immediately snatch you up, but Lugia appears to be deep in thought. Deciding whether to eat you or another Pokemon.
11422222222221.title: Lugia

choices: I meant if I should take you head or feet first!
Of course! The mouth isn't the only way into the body!
114222222222211.content:
"Y-you..." You stammer "You arn't thinking of eating me, are you?"

<Why yes, actually. Are you psychic too?> Lugia psychically responds, your eyes widening in horror as his answer came. All of you amazement of being in the presence of a legendary pokemon vanished as you realized you could very soon be inside of one. You turn to run, however at your size, getting away is not an option. The large legend's wing comes down upon you, pinning you between his feathery appendage and the ground.

"I-I thought legends were supposed to be benevolent and kind!" You cry out from under his wing.

<We are.> Lugia responds <But if we were kind to all of our prey, we never would be able to eat, now would we? Its the circle of life my little human friend. Now then, how shall I ingest you...>

"Y-You mean.." You stammer again "Theres more than one way!?"

Lugia smirks at your question...
114222222222211.title: A Legendary Meal

choices: Forces you the rest of the way in
Leaves you there and starts to fly
1142222222222112.content:
Using its psychic power to hold you in place, the Lugia lifts it wing off you and turns so its back is to you and raises its tail, revealing its pinkish tailhole. <There's more then one way to eat a meal> the Lugia tells you.

You try to break free of the psychic grip "N-no! Let me go!" you cry.

<Sorry little one, but you are my meal and I eat you how I want> The Lugia positions its tailhole above you head and pushes it down on you. Your head is forced into the smelly confines of the Lugia's rectum. You are forced to breath in the foul smelling air as your shoulders and chest are forced inside of its rectum. The Lugia...
1142222222222112.title: Turns around and raises its tail

choices: No, I can tell what it is!
11422222222222.title: Unown?

choices: You can take care of yourself!
1142222222222221.content: The Espeon walked over to you. "So... how did a human get to be this size? It's unheard of--at least to me. Human, what is your name?" Your name? "Um... I don't remember..." you reply. "Oh well that's alright. Maybe you'll remember it as time goes on. Oh my, I must be getting home to my family. Would you like to come? A human at your size wouldn't last long."
1142222222222221.title: Espeon...

11422222222222211.content:
"Of course I'll come with you. What's the worst that could happen?"

The Espeon smiles and flicks her tail towards you and, wrapping the forked tips around your body, plumps you down gently between her big pink ears. It's nice and warm here. And most importantly I'll be safe, you think to yourself.

"Oh, it won't be far, I promise you," she reassured you, "Hmm, maybe you should use this as protection from the rain."

A big green leaf quavers on a nearby bush and with a quick 'pluck' flies towards you. It comes down and everything goes darker.

"I'm sure you'll like my family. And they'll like you too. There's 9 of us, all together. You're probably familiar with eeveelutions, as a trainer?"

"Oh, yes. Yes, I know...don't tell me...there's Eevee and Espeon and... uh Flameon and...e-Electriceon?"

The Espeon stops. A nonplussed look on her face. "Well... it's not important. You'll learn when we get there."

The patter of rain on leaves and the magnified steps of the Pokemon seem louder now that you're smaller. Minutes go by and from what you can see from under the leaf on Espeon's head, the ground is getting more solid. Brown dirt turns to grey stone and the air gets warmer.

"We have this secret cave, you see. It's nice and warm and it's were we live. Oh it's not some dirty dark cave, we fixed it up. You'll see in a moment...we'll just get rid of this..." and the leaf lifts up into the air and flies backwards, out of view. Into your view now comes the lamp-lit inside of a large but nicely decorated home. A cave indeed, you can tell from the stone walls, but home.

"Why were you wearing a leaf on your head? Were you dressing up as me?", you hear a new voice say curiously. A girl.

"Erm...no." the Espeon replies, "You see Leafeon..."

"Hey what's that on your head? Is it a bug?" inquires a small Eevee coming out from under some pillows, one of the only eeveelutions that you do know.

"That's no bug! That's a person!" another new voice, this one a boy.

"Jolteon is correct, it's..." Espeon begins but is interrupted again.

"No way a tiny human?! Show me!" an overly excited voice yells from outside before a blue blur pounces on top of the Espeon.

"Ugh, watch out! You'll crush him!" she says, her pink fur suddenly completely wet.

"Hey Espy, you're back! I missed youu~!" another new voice, adding the chaos of new characters. This one a boy and quite lovely-dovey.

"Missed you too, Umby~--hey! Glaceon, give him back!"

You're suddenly taken into two very cold paws and a pair of dark teal eyes frown down upon you. "You're cold and wet." The vapor of her breath makes you shiver as it rises in the air.

"Umm, well yes-yes I am in fact!" you say between chatting teeth, "so about you put me somewhere...warm?"

"Yes." The female Glaceon smiles; a smile that worries you for some reason. "I could do that." She brings you closer to her. It gets colder. Then she opens her mouth and you see threads of saliva join from tongue to the roof of her mouth and gasp in surprise.

"Glaceon don't!" the Espeon yells out in horror but she doesn't reach you in time. You're plunged onto a...surprisingly warm but wet tongue. It seems strange that the inside of the Glaceon's mouth is warm while her outside is cold, but this momentary oddity quickly leaves your mind when it becomes completely black.

"OKAY! That's enough! Spit him out this instant."

"Nnnn." The blue icy Pokemon turns around and closes her eyes.

"Flareon? Where's Flareon? Don't make me do this to do, Glacey..."

"He's over there by the fireplace..."

"Thank you Jolty..." The pink Espeon walks cooly over to the fluffy Flareon sleeping by the warmth of the fireplace. "Please get up." she ruffles his fluffy yellow mane lightly with a paw.

The red and yellow puffball of a eeveelution sighs and opens a single eye. "Ugh...what is it? Is it dinner already."

Espeon rolls her eyes and improvises "Yes, and Glaceon has just eaten your portion."

"She what?!" he quickly gets up and scopes the room. Glaceon perks an ear and a drop of sweat rolls down her forehead.

In mid-air halfway across the room already, the Flareon gives a frightful war cry as fire shoots from his mouth and just as he is about to pounce on Glaceon...
11422222222222211.title: Go with her.

choices: You remain in the stomach, as the acid starts to affect you...
You get sucked into the small intestine (before the acid manages to affect you).
114222222222222112.content:
Without warning, the large slippery muscle pushes you against the roof of the mouth and you slip freely down the bumpy surface of the tongue. Your yells are faintly heard only to Glaceon, who gives a smug smile for having eaten you, a human. A moment later the smile on her face is replaced by a surprised shriek as the sweltering weight of Flareon tackles her, flat to the floor.

"Spit it out! Spit it out! It's MY meal, not yours!"

"Toooo-late." she says in sing-songy voice. Flareon begins to growl and huff in anger.

You slide down the fleshy tunnel. The air is stale and the sticky saliva brushes uncomfortably over every part of you. You grunt in frustration. But... but Espeon said that her family would like me! Like to have me for dinner would have been more accurate! Your feet meet with a barrier and your body slumps into a ball, but then the barrier gives way and you pour into a larger chamber.

"Ugh...I was afraid this might happen." Espeon rolls her eyes. By now Vaporeon too had joined the fight, not in earnest but for fun. She was on top of both Pokemon now, laughing her head off as the two struggled underneath her.

"Flareon...stop. I lied, we haven't even made dinner yet. I just wanted you to attack Glacey for me so she'd spit out this tiny human I brought in from the forest.."

"You what?" The Flareon stopped his brawling and look quizzical, "You...you mean to say that you haven't even made dinner yet? Oh, for heaven's sake, you woke me up for nothing!" and Flareon got up in a huff, tumbling the laughing Vaporeon off him, and went back to his fireside pillow.

Vaporeon looked Glaceon in the eye.

"Hi." she said bright-eyed.

Glaceon ignored her, got up and walked to Espeon.

"You've eaten him, haven't you?"

"Yes."

"I brought him for myself, you know. I was going to eat him! You...you...!"

"Go find another one then."

"Just how often do you think you find tiny little humans in the woods? You vomit him up this instant!"

"Make me." Glaceon said contemptuously and turned away, with a sly smile.

Even inside the rippling stomach you had heard everything. She...she had brought you to her home because she was going to eat you herself! She lied! At the moment it was the least of your problems, though, as you realized that the pool of liquid you were sitting in was starting to rise. Either that or the size of the stomach was shrinking. Perhaps both.

You tried to stand up but the elastic floor and lack of anything to grip made it impossible. You pounded with your fists on anything you could hit, but the flesh absorbed everything, or so it seemed.

Glaceon sat in her little corner of the Eevees' home. It was a dark and cool little room painted blue with a hanging painting of an icy landscape. She watched her belly, as tiny bumps appeared as disappeared. It was still alive and it was putting up quite a struggle, she thought. It won't last much longer though. It's just food. And food...well, food gets digested.
114222222222222112.title: Glaceon swallows you!

choices: Glaceon will accept, and eat a lot.
Glaceon isn't hungry. She just has a glass of water.
1142222222222221122.content:
You've somehow managed to precariously stand, but the acid is now up to your waist. You're putting a full effort into pounding against the top of the stomach, remembering having read somewhere that that region was responsible for the vomit reflex.

"LET....ME....OUT...!" you scream, a word between each hit.

Well isn't that cute. He's still struggling, Glaceon thinks to herself, stifling a giggle. May as well put him out of his misery.

The gravity shifts. You slip and before you can finish the "oh shi-" you started, your mouth fills with a sour fluid and you instinctively shut your eyes tight. You suddenly can't move your feet--a-are they stuck in something? What's that's deep gurgling sound?

"B—UUUUUUUURRRP~"
Glacey belched long and loud in deep satisfaction. The sound echoed in the room just as the door cracked open a bit. A yellow muzzle poked in and peered at the blue stretching glaceon, her rump in the air and forepaws stretched flat forward. Teal eyes squinted in pleasure as the last of the gas from her stomach rudely made its way out, a mixture between a yawn and a burp.

"Um...I'm sorry I didn't know you were..." she blushed shyly and was about to turn.

"Leafeon." she fixed her posture to one more modest, "Don't leave."

"Um. Espy told me," the leaf on her forehead drooped over an eye but she swatted it out of the way with a brown tipped paw "She told me to tell you to come to dinner and, and—she forgives you if-if you apologize."

There was a moment of silence.

"Is that so..."

"Glacey..."

"Then let's have dinner." Glaceon assured Leafeon with a smile. Leafeon sighed in relief and smiled back.


You were now in a much less capacious space. The walls kept your arms to your sides but at least there was room to breath but just barely. When the Glaceon had so suddenly let all the air out of her stomach, what probably happened was you were smushed down so hard that your feet got caught in the sphincter that joins intestine and stomach and you managed to slip past it. At least you're being spared the pain of being dissolved alive, you consider. If there's any "bright side" that's gotta be about it.


Seven eeveelutions were already at the dinner table eating various kinds of noodles and rice, when Leafy and Glacey walked in. Leafy sat next to Vaporeon and began to meekly put salad onto her plate.

"LEAFY!" Vaporeon prompted, his cheeks stuffed with food "YOU GOTTA TRY THIS!" Leafeon hardly managed to let out an "eek!" before a blue paw rudely stuffed a fat dumpling into her mouth. Laughter erupted around the table. Glaceon couldn't help but join in when she saw the shocked expression on Leafeon's face as the meek grass-type couldn't decide whether to try and chew the thing or spit it out.

"Now that we're all in a better mood," Espy looked at the ice-blue pokemon who quickly suppressed her laughs, "why don't we eat?"

Glaceon looked at Espeon then looked away, pretending not to hear her.

"Oh come now Glaceon. Just say you're sorry and it'll all—" but before Umbreon could end his sentence the glaceon gave a "Hmph!" and turned her head, still holding onto her grudge.

"Just have some food won't you, Glacey?" Jolteon asked her kindly, sipping a glass of juice. He didn't often speak to Glaceon but had always wanted to get to know her better. "Come on!"
1142222222222221122.title: You get sucked into the small intestine (before...

choices: Shaking her head, this was your mistake
11422222222222211221.content:
Inside the intestine, you begin to struggle, attempting to bring you earns in front of you so you can push yourself through faster. As you manage to bring your right arm up to your chest level walls around you clamp down and shake around you. Through the flesh around you the sound of giggling can be heard.

Glaceon had just shoved the first mouthful of mashed berries into her mouth when the human began to squirm. She immediately spewed her food out while laughing from the ticklish sensation. All the other Pokemon around the table gave her odd looks as she tried to explain between breaths. "He's ticklish... But I think he's done."

Within the confines of her gut you heard everything, and developed a plan. Even if you couldn't get out faster from it you could make her next few hours miserable. You immediately began struggling again, and the uncontrollable laughter ensued.

Bra hahahahahaha... Esp... Snert... Chortle... Please... Bwahaha. Take him out. You can teleport things right?

Espeon things for a moment before
11422222222222211221.title: Glaceon will accept, and eat a lot.

114222222222222112211.content:
“You ate it, you deal with it,” Espeon flicked her tail as she stood up to snag a second helping of Mago berries.
          “But Espeon…,” Glaceon pouted and slapped on her best puppy-dog eyes, “it feels wiieerrd in there…”
          “Not my problem.”
          “Pleeaase Espeon!” the ice-type erupted into another giggle-fit, “I don’t care where you drop it! Just — tee-hee — get it out of there!” Glaceon dropped her head on the tabletop. Her mug sagged into an exaggerated expression of exhaustion. She landed in her Oran berries.
          Espeon closed her eyes and set her forked tail tips on her forehead. She was reconsidering Glaceon’s request — but with a twist. She'd love to ‘port the little guy in a...funny spot. After a moment of consideration, Espeon decided to…
114222222222222112211.title: Shaking her head, this was your mistake

1142222222222221122112.content:
Espeon flashed a toothy smirk, but quickly wiped it away and pulled her best poker face.
          “Fine,” Espeon said, “I’ll get him out. Thank me later.”
          “Ohh, thankyouthankyouthankyou!” Glaceon had two paws placed her fuzzy belly, trying to pin you down. It wasn’t working.
          “I said, ‘thank me later’,” a devious grin creeped up her face, “but remember, you said anywhere,” her eyes burned a blinding magenta as she warped you somewhere in Glaceon’s…
1142222222222221122112.title: Scheming Espeon

11422222222222211221121.content: Espeon's eyes glowed in magenta as she moved you right out of Glaceon's intestine to somewhere else in her upper body. Where did she send you to in the ice-type's freezing body?
11422222222222211221121.title: Upper body.

11422222222222211221122.content: Espeon’s eyes gradually dimmed to their natural color. At roughly the same pace, Glaceon’s widened. Her cheeks reddened, spine snapped rigid, and paws raised to stop her jaw from smashing into the floor as she realized in embarrassment and horror that Espeon sent you to her…
11422222222222211221122.title: Down Below...

114222222222222112211222.content:
Deep inside Glaceon, below her belly, was you, plopped in the middle of Glaceon’s pisstank. A baby-pink, wrinkled bubble that smelled like a gas station bathroom and flooded with a foul liquid. Glaceon jumped. Your surroundings lurched upward, launching you and your swimming pool into the air. Gravity kicked in and you splashed down with a mighty impact. Submerged, you watched as the remaining airborne piss drizzle down in a literal golden shower.

          “Get it out of there! Right! Now!” Glaceon’s cheeks were on fire. Her shoulders hunched diminutively, ears low, paws over her crotch. Everyone’s staring. Flareon’s rolling on the floor, laughing. She wanted to run under the table.
          “Stop laughing...please…,” her feet tap-danced under the table. She could absolutely feel you in there. Every little movement. Unlike before, it wasn’t ticklish. It was worse. Her bladder was far more tender than her guts, and Glaceon had a sensitive bladder. Every little ripple, splash, flop — she could feel. Every single titulation sent her bladder into a leaping spasm. Which, predictably, made both your and her days worse. Everything in the organ went airborne, and when it landed, Glaceon swore a hammer hit her loins.
          “Espeon, I’m sorry! I’m so, so sorry! I was trying to be cool! I don’t wanna pee myself! Get it out!”
          “Aww, is Icecube gonna melt?” Espeon continued her quest for more Mago berries, “don’t do it at the table, please. You know where the bathroom is.”
          Glaceon wanted to say something smart, but swallowed it. She had to make it to the bathroom. She was not going to pee herself. Not in front Flareon. Especially not in front of Espeon. She speedily galloped away, trying to balance on three paws. Her front-right paw was buried in her quivering groin. A plug to stop the flood.

          However bad Glaceon perceived her situation to be, your’s was worse. Your prison constantly bounced and contracted. Glaceon’s clumsy strides rocked the pisstank back-and-forth and up-and-down all while her contractions squeezed and made your surroundings leap. You spent as much time in the air as you did underwater. With every buck of her hip, you were tossed into the air. Sometimes you’d hit the roof of the fleshy, flooded, cave and you’d hear a startled yelp. Then Glaceon’s paw would bear down on your cage even harder. The room would indent, the walls would flutter, and the cycle would repeat.
          Being this close to Glaceon, it was inevitable that you would learn a little secret: when she’s nervous, her bladder jumps into overdrive. The “water” level has almost doubled since you landed here. Glaceon’s private pond was nearing its capacity and, last you checked, you didn’t have gills.

          Glaceon arrived at her destination. She scurried to the old wooden door. She reached for the brass doorknob to find her worst fear realized: the door was locked. Someone was already in there.
          “Let me in! Let me in!” Glaceon begged, “I gotta go!”
          “Glaceon?” a dainty, chiming voice: Sylveon’s peeped, “The washroom’s, um, occupied. Is it an emergen-”
          “Yes it’s an emergency!” Glaceon rapped on the door, warm tears in her eyes, “I gotta go! Real bad! Let me in!”
          Glaceon’s situation was dire. Her legs were trembling and her bladder was bursting. She heard Sylveon’s footsteps. The pixie was heading toward the door. Can she contain herself until Sylveon arrives?
114222222222222112211222.title: An Ice-type's Most Private Pool

choices: She carries you to her room - she wants to talk to you.
She carries you into the living room - she wants to payback Espeon.
1142222222222221122112221.content:
"Come on! Come on!!" the agitated ice type yells at the closed door, struggling to keep herself from peeing. She grits her teeth.

Fortunately for her, the door opens a couple of seconds later as Sylveon steps out. Before she can even talk, Glaceon bolts inside the bathroom, shutting the door behind herself and quickly locking it.

She desperately goes for the toilet bowl.
"Here we go!" she exclaims.

Meanwhile, inside the depths of this ice type, you are about to drown into the foul liquid. You almost go unconscious, when your body gets sucked in a whirlpool, which drags you down along the piss. You hit the bottom of the bladder and are forced into an opening, which leads to the outside world. To freedom.

Glaceon gives a deep sigh of relief. She didn't pee herself. She feels all the fluid leaving her body, then she hears something plopping into the bowl. And she's pretty sure she knows what is it. Or, more specifically, who is it.

Leaping off the toilet, the ice type peeks into the bowl. As expected, the tiny human she ate earlier, and the same human her sister teleported into her bladder, is floating there, soaked in her piss, spitting out said liquid.

Glaceon can't help but give a small giggle. You glare up at her.
"Well little one, seems you had quite the adventure today." the blue pokemon says.
"Yeah. Are you going to flush now? Or perhaps I've had enough for one day?" you retort angrily.

Before Glaceon can respond, someone knocks at the door.
"Glaceon? Are you alright?" the ice type recognizes Sylveon outside.
"Yes. I am." she replies.
"Oh great. Are you done? Because I, ehm, was in the middle of something..." the fairy type says. Glaceon looks down at you again, smiling. You are now almost sure she'll flush you.

"Not yet Sylveon. But it won't take long." Glaceon says, before leaning forward.
'Here we go, she's reaching for the toilet handle.' you think, exasperated. But nothing happens. Instead, the ice type returns into view, this time holding a toilet brush in her mouth.

She lowers it into the bowl, right near you. You stare at the object confusedly. She's helping you? A nod from the ice type confirms that she's indeed aiding you. You grasp the toilet brush as Glaceon pulls it out.

She carefully walks over the sink and drops you in it, before throwing the brush aside. You sit there in disbelief as she turns on the water. The fresh liquid comes down on you, cleaning off the piss you're covered in. Another liquid pours on you. You recognize it as liquid soap.

Glaceon lets you wash yourself for a few minutes, before turning off the water. She leans forward, taking the back of your shirt in her mouth and closing it, lifting it -and you along- up. She doesn't bother to hide you. Sylveon won't be a problem -she's far too shy to try anything anyway- and the others already know about you.

She exits the bathroom, Sylveon briefly taking notice of the small human hanging from her mouth, before stepping into the bathroom.

You stay silent the whole time Glaceon walks. But, from where she carries you, you can definitively make out what she's up to...
1142222222222221122112221.title: Yes

choices: Explore around the cave for a bit.
11422222222222211221122212.content:
Glaceon carries you to the living room, where Espeon, Leafeon and Vaporeon currently are, chatting to each other, unaware of the fourth Eeveelution that is sneaking into the room.

The ice type, who is holding you with her mouth, makes her way in a corner without getting noticed. She gently releases you on the ground.
"Listen up human," she says you.
"I know how to repay Espeon for her prank, but I'll need you." she explains.
"What do I have to do with this? You ate me!" you exclaim angrily.

Glaceon looks away to check if her siblings heard you. Fortunately, they don't seem to have noticed anything, as they keep speaking. Glaceon turns to you again.
"Don't be like that, I helped you then, right? Or did you like being covered in piss?" she whispers.
"... Go on. What do I have to do?" you ask, remembering which prank Glaceon was talking about.

The ice type grins.
"All I need is a distraction. Just walk there pretending you are leaving. If the plan works, Espeon will stop you. At that point, you'll have to keep her in place. And then... you'll see what happens." she says, winking. You nod your head.
"Good, now go!" she whispers, pushing you away with a paw.

You do as Glaceon instructed you and walk in front of the three Eeveelutions, making sure they take notice of you. You walk towards the exit of the cave where the Eevee family lives. You hear nothing coming from outside, the rain must have stopped. But it's pitch black, you can't see anything out there.
"Hey little guy, where are you going?" a familiar voice asks. You recognize it as Espeon.

You mentally prepare yourself.
"I'm leaving." you reply, turning to notice the psychic type approaching.
"I wouldn't recommend wandering in a forest at night to someone as small and vulnerable as you." she says.
"Why would you want to leave anyway? Is that because Glaceon ate you?" she asks, acting oblivious.

You turn your gaze behind Espeon for a second, noticing Glaceon sneaking behind Leafeon and Vaporeon, who are watching the scene with interest, not taking note of their sister behind them.
"No, I'm leaving because you tricked me! You wanted to eat me, and you send me into Glaceon's bladder!" you shout. Espeon is taken aback by your outburst.
"Oh... you heard that..." she mutters.
"Yes." you say, looking at Glaceon again. She's approaching Espeon.
"Well, I- Hey!" the psychic pokemon doesn't get to finish as a wave of frosty air is shot from Glaceon's mouth, right into her sister's big ears, freezing them.

Then, without wasting any time, Glaceon scoops you in her mouth once again, before dashing away, in direction of her room. A shadow ball misses her of a centimeter.

Glaceon runs into her room, shutting the door behind herself with her back paw. She lets you on the ground, before starting laughing.
"The look on her face! Priceless!" she laughs. You chuckle along her.
"Good job human!" she says.

Right then, your stomach growls. You just seem to remember you haven't eaten all day, since you woke up in this forest. The icy giantess smirks.
"Well, I think you earned your food. Wait here." she says, walking out of the room. You get to take a look around. Glaceon's room is small - to her anyway - and cold, as you expected though. It's not your idea of bedroom, but, then again, you're in a cave.

Glaceon returns shortly after, holding a berry in a corner of her mouth, while carrying a small piece of cloth of some sort in the other. She drops the berry in front of you and lets the cloth fall down to the ground.
"I figured you should sleep here for tonight. We wouldn't want Espeon doing something nasty to you, right? But, at the same time, it's way too cold in here for you. And, unless you want to freeze to death, you can't risk sleeping with me. So you will have to arrange yourself with this. At least until we're sure my sister isn't going to harm you for tricking her." she explains as you eat your berry. You give a small nod and resume eating.

The ice type waits for you to satisfy your hunger and, as you give out a sigh that means you're stuffed, she lies down on the cold floor of her room. She yawns.
"Well, I think I'm going to sleep, human. Whatever you do, don't go outside until tomorrow... but, if you do, avoid Espeon. When I got the berry, Vaporeon was unfreezing her ears with scald. Maybe she went to her room, but I'd recommend you don't take risks. But if you want to explore for a bit, you're free to do it. Goodnight." she says, rolling on a side.

Glaceon quickly falls asleep, while you wonder what to do. You could use some sleep, but you're also pretty curious about the cave. The Eeveelutions fixed it, it almost looks like a human house. And maybe the psychic type is in her room, like Glaceon said.
"What to do?" you ask yourself.
11422222222222211221122212.title: She carries you into the living room - she want...

choices: Glaceon meekly retreats to her room.
1142222222222221122112222.content:
You assumed this was Glaceon’s bursting point. The bladder has nearly reached its carrying capacity. The organ was twitching incessantly, bouncing about in a spirited effort to not leak. "If there's something... if there's something wrong, you can tell me." this only makes you feel worse.

But you really don't want anymore trouble with Zorua... heck, you don't want to see her anymore!

"Everything's alright, Sylveon. Stop worrying so much, alright? I got dirty again because... because... uh... Eevee mistaken me for a toy, I believe, and she gave me one good tongue bath. And the smell must have been something she ate before." you say, feigning disgust. Just remembering where have you been, it results pretty easy for you to do so...

Sylveon nods upon listening to your story... and then, she notices one particular.
"Wait - ‘she’?" she asks. You freeze, but quickly recompose yourself.
"Yes. I actually found that our... friend," it's pretty hard for you to pronounce the word 'friend'. 'That nasty fox' seems more fitting.
"Is actually a female..." you finish your sentence.

Sylveon goes silent for a moment, just eyeing you.

And then...

"Marvelous!" she cheers, her voice echoing around the room. She suddenly leaps up, and lands on all fours on the bed. As a result, you are sent flying.

Luckily, Sylveon catches you with one ribbon, puts you back in place and nears her muzzle closer to you.
"Thank you! I really wanted know that, but it seemed...
inopportune to check." she says. She pushes you against her pillowy cheek with one paw and happily nuzzles you.

You awkwardly rub the back of your head.

Sylveon glances around the room, before her gaze travels back down on you.
"As you may have guessed," she says.
"This is where you're going to be sleeping."
"Wait, ‘sleeping’?" you inquire. What did she mean? She doesn't expect you to stay any longer, does she? The idea of Glaceon and Zorua under the same roof with you isn't exactly what you'd call 'safe'.

Alright, Glaceon turned out to be relatively harmless, but you're still kinda afraid of her.

And Zorua is pretty far from your idea of harmless.

But Sylveon doesn't seem to notice your fears, and simply smiles brightly.
"Of course, silly. Oh, I could make a tiny bed just for you!... Or even better," one of her ribbons travels down your chin.
"We could share..." your face flushes red at the last remark.
"Uhm..." you mutter, making the pink and white pokemon giggle.

Sylveon then lays down, and spends the next few minutes staring at you with a smile. You just stare back at her, wondering what she's up to.

Finally, the giantess talks again.
"You know what?" she asks. You tilt your head, curious about her intentions.

In response, the pokemon moves two of her ribbons, and firmly wraps them around your waist, lifting you off the silky surface of the bed.

Your world shakes as she leaps off the bed and heads towards the door.
"I was thinking, since I already showed part of the cave and my... our... secret, why don't we...
114222222222222112211222211122121222.title: Resisting the charm of a giant fairy.

1142222222222221122112222111221212221.title: "... we resume our tour? There's still ...

choices: "Okay! I'll be your slave! Just let me out!" you give in
"No deal! I'd rather staying in here!" you persist
114222222222222112211222211122122.content:
Exhausted, you barely register the Zorua talking, her voice shaking your fleshy, squishy and hot surroundings.

"Y'know lil' one... that was amazing!" she exclaimed in sexual excitement.
"I don't think I'm letting you go so soon after all..."

You pale, mentally invoking for Sylveon's help. She needs to just find you're missing and step back into ‘Eevee's’ room...

Reality hits you, and hits you pretty hard as you sourly realize that, even if Sylveon did come inside the room, you'd be still trapped in Zorua's bowels, meaning the she wouldn't be able to find you.

"God..." you mumble, your head dropping against the soft floor of the Zorua's intestines.

"Hey, did ya pass out back there?" Zorua asks from outside while wiggling her rear, shaking your surroundings.

You grit your teeth and keep your mouth, not wanting to talk to the cruel vixen... and also to avoid your slick, smelly surroundings getting anywhere your mouth, but mainly because you don't want to talk to Zorua.

Instead, you start to fidget around, trying to turn around, determined to crawl back to the anus and try to flee from your cruel entrapment.

"Hey, whatever ya doin' in there, don't stop!" Zorua chimed from outside.

Your mind briefly goes back to Glaceon. You recall yourself being trapped in her as well... and she had Espeon teleport you out.

However, such thing backfired horribly, and you found yourself swimming in golden water within the confines of Glaceon's bladder...

Seriously, why do you keep ending up in weird places?! If you're not in someone's digestive system, you're either in their mouths or-

You sigh to yourself as you struggle frenetically, still trying to turn around... only to find the muscles clamping down on you.

Hard.

You whimper as your struggles die down, your body quite sore from the grip of the intestines.

Outside, the dark type simply snickered to herself as she shrugged, deciding that, squirming or not, the human felt good cooped up in her behind.

So, she decides, she could give you quite some time to adjust to your new surroundings...

--

As the incredibly long and uneventful day goes on, you remain trapped in the dark, smelly, disgusting confines of Zorua's rear.

You tried quite a few more times to get back to Zorua's anus, but you've always failed miserably... just your luck, you guessed.

You were exhausted, hungry, thirsty and above all disgusted from your entrapment. Luckily, Zorua still didn't have to use the bathroom, but now it was only a matter of time, you guessed.

You couldn't keep track of time in here, but it was surely hours ago since you entered this dark, fleshy hell, so it wouldn't be long before you meet her last meal up close...

As if on cue, her bowels suddenly shake, causing you to sigh in desperation.

But then, the Zorua talked again,
"You still in there, lil' rat?" she asked.

You don't respond.

"Look. I know you're listening, so I'll make you an offer." she says, making you perk up.

Offer...?

"Listen up. This whole thing felt amazing, and I'm not willing to let you go with Sylveon again... but I suppose I could let you out from there before things get... nasty." she explains, her voice shaking the warm intestinal floor, making your body vibrate within hers.

Regardless, you perk up.

"R-Really?!" you shout, your voice echoing in her bowels.

"Hold on." she interjected.
"I'll let ya out... IF you promise to do certain things for me~"

You felt the excitement in her voice. You didn't like the excitement in her voice.

She was really asking you to be a sex toy in exchange of freedom?!

At this point, getting out of here with the remainings of her last meal was less humiliating!

Initially, you don't respond.

You ponder the offer you're given by the vixen for a while.

"Well?" she chimed cheerfully from outside.
"I bet my tail you want to get out of there as soon as possible..." she encouraged, mischievously shaking her rear.

You needed no further words from her.
114222222222222112211222211122122.title: Dignity for freedom?

choices: "Pleasure me." Zorua stands on her hind legs, showing her sex to you...
"Lick." Zorua places her paws in front of you with a devious smirk...
1142222222222221122112222111221221.content:
You didn't know if it was fear, humiliation, or if it was the smelly air inside the rectum of the Zorua starting to get to your head, but you suddenly can't bear remaining in this place anymore.

You'd lose your dignity, but you'd be free... relatively free, since you'd still be trapped with a nasty vixen whose even nastier intent was using you as a sex toy/slave. But, you figured, such thing would be less humiliating than getting ejected from her body with the remains of what she last ate.

"Okay! I'll be your slave, just let me out!" you shout, your voice vibrating through the smelly, fleshy walls of the 'cavern’.

Soon enough, you heard the Zorua's response: a snicker. A dark, mischievous snicker which sent shivers down your spine and made you reconsider your choice.

However, it was too late.

The rectal muscles clamp down on you as Zorua clenches her butt. Then, for a moment, the fleshy walls release you, only to clamp down again.

The process is repeated for several other times.

Clench-unclench, clench-unclench, clench-unclench as you are dragged along the slimy walls. The pressure around you loosened as you approached the anus of the giantess. And then... light.

You barely register the facts going on around you.

A rapid fall, the Zorua's tail wagging above you, her anus closing again... and then, you land on your back on the floor, the cream carpet breaking your fall. Nonetheless, you felt sore, partly because of your rough landing, partly because of the time you spent in Zorua's rectum, her muscles clamping down on you for the whole process, causing you pain.

You lay motionless, your legs and arms having fallen asleep while you were confined in the rectum of the vixen.

Soon enough, the ground started to tremble beneath you as your dark type captress turns around and spots you on the floor.

"Hehe... Hi there, lil' rat... welcome back." the Zorua snickered as she kneels over your comparatively tiny form, her ice-blue eyes staring at you intently.
"Hope you had fun back there."

You open your mouth to reply, but close it immediately after, opting to just shut up. You had enough for one day, you didn't want the vixen to come with new tortures to 'punish' you.

Zorua kept snickering, while you tried to regain some sensibility in your limbs. Your legs start to wake up, followed by your arms.

And finally, you stand up again and look at the dark vixen sitting in front of you, a grin spread across her cheeks.

She snickers again.
"So, if I'm not mistaken, we had a certain deal..." she chimes, eyes glued on you, a maniacal grin glued to her face.

Again, you remain silent and keep staring at the giantess.

"And you can start your work right away!" Zorua said.

For the first time since you came out of her behind, you finally speak,
"Doing what?" you ask, not really wanting to know... but, after all, if you really had to do this, you HAD to know what to do...

The vixen snickered... and then, her face suddenly darted forward, eclipsing your sight as her nose pushed against your chest, her huge eyes bigger than you. You felt her warm breath on your body, her fur ticking your skin. And then, she spoke.

"I do have a suggestion, ya lil'one." she said.

Before your eyes, her mouth opened, her teeth shining sinisterly as she closed the cave again, her canines piercing your shirt, leaving you pale and startled. Zorua raised her head with a sudden movement, letting go of you in the process.

You find yourself launched several feet up in the air, before gravity started working against you and pulled you back down... only for you to notice Zorua opening her mouth again, waiting... waiting for you!

You scream as you helplessly flail in midair, trying to change the direction of your fall in order to not fall into that abyss of death.

But your struggles are in vain.

Darkness. Heat. White razors everywhere and a slick red floor beneath your feet, a dark abyss in front of you.

Your eyes catch one last glint of light before the lips of Zorua fall back in place, sealing you in darkness.

Immediately, the living floor starts moving, causing you to lose your footing as you fall down onto the squishy, soaked ground. Big drops of saliva fall from the palate, hitting you and soaking you to the bone in the thick liquid, while the tongue keeps licking you, soaking you in even more saliva.

"Mhh~" a moan echoes inside the cavern, menacing to break your eardrums as you are just above the Zorua's vocal chords.

"LET ME-" your cry is reduced to silence as you're flipped on your belly, your face falling in a small lake of saliva under the tongue, your open mouth getting filled with the disgusting liquid.

You raise your head, spit out said liquid in disgust. Again, the tongue darts towards you. You start backing up, trying to avoid the slick red muscles... but, eventually, you halt as your back hits something hard.

You pale as you realize that you're standing by one of the teeth of Zorua.

"God..." you mumble. One wrong movement, and you'd end up impaled..

The tongue soon reaches your immobile form as it presses your against the hard tooth and keeps licking.

The whole thing goes on for a while, until you're laying motionless on the tongue, beaten, tired, soaked...

Then, a glob of saliva forms around you.

And you find it sliding downwards as Zorua finally spits you out, the glob of saliva reaching the floor and releasing you. You cough as you splutter saliva that is not yours.

"Hehe... you taste pretty good lil' rat~" the dark vixen chimed as she eyed you.

"That's what Glaceon thought too..." you meekly whisper as you stand up, desperately trying to remove the saliva from your hair with your hands, causing the Zorua to snicker even louder.

"You'd better get used to this all, lil' one... oh, we'll have so much fun... me at least~" she told as she eyed you with a mischievous look.

"Yeah, whatever." you simply respond, uncaring. Nothing mattered anymore, you were just a slave in the paws of a dark type vixen.

Zorua snickered again.
"Glad you learned your place ya slave," she chimed, before adopting her grin again.
"And now, on with our next ‘game’..."
1142222222222221122112222111221221.title: Submission to Zorua

choices: You start giving her a paw massage.
Best not to test her. You keep licking.
11422222222222211221122221112212212.content:
"What?" was all you could get out as the Zorua's fore-paws neared. Part of you knew it was unsurprising. This gigantic trickster fox seemed to have no real sense of what she would and wouldn't do to a shrunken human. Another part of you, though, was shocked at the idea of putting their tongue anywhere near the Pokemon's paws, and it was sickening to realize that, thanks to all manner of indecent torments and tortures you'd already gone through, that that truly had grown not to be every part of you. But not as sickening as the task you had just been so easily and mischievously assigned.

"Was I not clear enough for ya?" The paws scooted closer, violating the personal bubble you didn't really have anymore. "These puppies need some love, and I'm fairly certain you... wouldn't mind givin' im some."

Something chilling pervaded those final few words. Like a threat she didn't even have to state outright, tucked away under the toothy grin that would seem fairly innocuous to anyone else.

With a sigh, you eyed her paws with a dead look. You could see the bits of dirt and grime that intermingled with her fur and paw-pads, nearly gagging at the sight alone. All this would be disgusting even at your normal size, but this puny... the task ahead of you was a humiliation you could never fully prepare for.

So you clenched you eyes shut, leaned forward, and gave the smallest hint of a lap you could offer. It didn't really help. The taste was still as utterly terrible as you expected it to be even with the smallest lick. But you hoped that the Zorua would assume that that's the most feeling she would get from a tongue of your size, and be none the wiser to the fact that you could do better.

"C'mon lil' thing, you're not getting past me with that. Give'im some real licks." She punctuated her order with a lick of her own at her lips, reminding you of your previous torture even as you tried to mentally affix yourself to a new way for the remnants of your dignity to be shed.

You closed you eyes once more, having no intention of opening them again until your heard the word from Zorua that you could stop. If that word would ever come. You brought out your tongue once more, and pushed your head forward till you felt contact. You had to struggle not to have your eyes bug back open, swiping your tongue up the second you thought it would be satisfying to Zorua. And from the murrs you could hear alone, you had to assume that it was.

If only that was enough. If only a moment of satisfaction was all the cruel fox wanted, and not that mixed with the thrill she so obviously got by putting you in the place she had created for you.

Another few licks, and your tongue (and whole mouth for that matter) felt violated. Earthy substances of all sorts invaded your taste buds, strands of fur and bits of who knows what finding their way into your mouth. You grasped at your stomach. Did this Zorua ever even wash?! Did Sylveon even give the "Eevee" a bath when she plucked them straight from the rainy wild? It certainly didn't seem like it. Or... taste like it...

What did you do to deserve this?

That emotionally-charged thought bubbled up from its place in your mind, eliciting a huff and a speedy punch to the pad of Zorua's left fore-paw. At first, you were expecting to get scolded for "disrespecting her paws" or whatever she would come up with to only further assert her dominance over you, but as a loud hum resonated from throughout Zorua's form instead, you had an idea come to you.

That simple punch clearly did something for her. And a bit of exhaustion in the arms seemed trivial in comparison to having your sense of taste destroyed. Maybe a paw rub would do just as well as licking, if not better.

Would she even mind?

You cracked open an eye and looked between the red and black, furry paws that sat before you upturned, and the pleased, yet increasingly impatient look on Zorua, considering your options...
11422222222222211221122221112212212.title: At Zorua's Paws

choices: Sylveon and Glaceon come in, noticing ‘Eevee’ alone...
Sylveon and Glaceon come in, noticing ‘Eevee’ and you...
Sylveon and Glaceon come in, noticing Zorua and you...
114222222222222112211222211122122121.content:
Uncertain, you slowly backed away from the giant pillar of red and black fur.

Obviously, the action didn't escape the Zorua's ice-blue eyes. She had been staring at you throughout the whole humiliating experience of you licking her paws.

At least, to you it was humiliating; to her, it was hilarious.

"Hey! Whoever told ya to stop? Get back to work!" she exclaimed - didn't anyone in the other rooms hear her voice? Couldn't Sylveon hear ‘Eevee’ talking and rush inside of the room to realize the truth?

It didn't matter now.

You were sure that she was coming back at some point, and you'd get her attention then... if you weren't trapped somewhere nasty.

You looked up at the expectant Zorua, then at her paws again. And, instead of your tongue, you extended your arms, pushing your hands through the thick fur of her paw.

You gave it an experimental rub, eliciting a small moan from the dark-type vixen above. She remained silent, this was a good thing.

Slowly, you started rubbing with a bit more energy, while your gaze slowly traveled upwards.

The Zorua was smirking at you.

"I don't remember telling ya to stop licking." she said.

You paled and immediately stopped rubbing. The giantess snickered.
"But I didn't tell ya to stop rubbing either." she said, and you wore a look of confusion.

"Hm... didn't think you'd give me a massage on your own ya lil’ one... but keep it up." she said, her grin not giving any signs of wanting to fade.

Either she really really enjoyed to see you worshipping her paw or she was coming up with new ideas to continue this afterwards.

You hoped for the first one.

Given her approval, you started rubbing more vigorously, your fingers scrubbing off the dirt stuck in her furry fore-paw, the vixen giving off murmurings of appreciation.

"Yeah... keep going..." she moaned. You didn't know whether to feel proud because you were doing something good or feel even more humiliated because of the task you were doing good.

You quickly shook your thought off as you simply kept rubbing, speeding up or slowing down to please the giant vixen more... and, from her moans, you could tell that you were doing it.

Zorua had her eyes closed as she lazily sat down on the carpeted floor, enjoying your paw-massage.

You pulled back from the furry paw and bent to look at the giant paw-pad, which was as large as your upper body you judged.

You placed your hands on it and started rubbing the smooth part of her paw as well.

Immediately, Zorua moaned loudly. You took it as a good signal and kept going, other moans joining the first one out of Zorua's mouth.

"That's... that's it... don't stop ya..." she muttered as your hands slid up and down her soft paw-pad.

It was... weird to say the least. You could literally feel the muscles beneath the flesh shifting, as if the paw itself was trying to thank you for your efforts by caressing your hands.

All while the giantess in front of you kept moaning.

But soon, her right fore-paw started to feel cut out by the one-sided massage.

Soon, she gently but firmly kicked you, with enough force to make you fall down on your butt, which hit the carpet.

The vixen snickered as she held out her right fore-paw, which was still in need of a good rub, you could tell by the mix of dirt, dust, soil and strands of fur clinging to her paw.

"The other," she unnecessarily said as you got up and approached the giant paw. Zorua started snickering - she took pleasure seeing this tiny human worshipping her paws.

"Y'know... you licked, then rubbed my left paw... now you get to lick and rub my right paw!" she chimed, while your face assumed a milky white color.

You had to do both things simultaneously!?

In disgust, you looked up at the vixen, hoping to find any trace of hilarity in her eyes... of course there was, but this certainly wasn't a joke.

You sighed, still wondering what did you do to end up in such situation... situations.

You ended up in two mouths, one stomach, two rectums, in a bladder and at the paws of this vixen.

And all in less than a day.

You sighed as, once more, you closed your eyes and stuck your tongue out while extending your arms forward.

Both touched the fur, your mouth getting assaulted with disgusting substances once again.

You felt sick, your stomach wanted to throw up whatever you last ate... but you thought that Zorua wouldn't exactly appreciate it if you threw up all over her paw.

To keep your mind off things, you started thinking about Sylveon.

She said no one else knew about ‘Eevee’, so she brought her meals no? She was definitely coming back. You optimistically started to think that she was going to find you, she was going to pull you out of this hell...

Or maybe, Flareon... Sylveon mentioned that he came into the room sometimes, all you had to do was get his attention... but you didn't have any friendship with him, was he going to help you?

You hoped so...

Lost in thought, you didn't notice that you have been licking and rubbing Zorua's paw for quite some time. The dark-type was enjoying it.

She suddenly licked her lips - now, you had to lick and rub her paw-pad... she loved the feeling.

She suddenly rose her paw, placing it on your chest and making you back away while you opened your eyes, finding yourself face-to-pad with her paw.

Zorua snickered, while you felt sick once again - the pad was coated in even more dirt and grime than the paw did...

"And now my pad, ya lil’-" Zorua didn't finish.

You suddenly noticed her looking at the door of the room. And you felt the ground trembling softly under your feet for some reason.

Suddenly, a sigh echoed in the room from the other side of the door.

Your heart perked up, while Zorua listened carefully.

"This is the last room I showed him... I could swear I still had him when I left..."

Sylveon! And she was searching for you!

"Sure you didn't leave him somewhere else?" someone replied.

Glaceon... had Sylveon asked her, a half-depressed ice-type, to help her find you...?

It was Zorua's heart to perk up now, maybe the two were going to leave...

Another sigh.

"No... I'm sure this was the last room I showed him... c-can you keep a secret?" Sylveon asked.

"Sure."

The door started to open.

Zorua noticed it on the very last second...
114222222222222112211222211122122121.title: The last torture?

choices: Zorua picked you up in her mouth and snatched you away!
Zorua scampered away! Who knows where she went?
Glaceon let loose a Icy Wind to hinder Zorua’s escape!
1142222222222221122112222111221221213.content:
The moment the door opened was when everyone’s hearts stopped. Stilled by fear, Zorua’s was. Sylveon’s heart was stiffened by shock, and bewilderment binded Glaceon’s. Yours was uplifted with hope. It was floating in your chest, weightless with anticipation. Zorua’s crushing paw threatened to push it into your throat. You saw Sylveon’s wide eyes grow even larger. Her white pupils darted frantically as she examine the scene while her mind toiled to understand it. She saw you pinned by the Zorua’s paw, nearly lost in the jungle of the carpeted floor. Meanwhile Glaceon was simply befuddled. Her brow was furrowed in confusion as her mouth hung open in a silent, cool gasp.

         Then, you craned your head toward your captor. Her mouth was open in shock. A dribble of drool had begun its trickling journey from the left corner her mouth. Earlier, she had drooled in pleasure during your torture. Now that fear has gripped her limbs, she self-consciously felt the slim stream of slobber slip off her black lips and slide down her fur — unable to lift a paw to halt its progress. Sylveon’s eyes traced its downward progress.
It felt like time had halted. No one dared to speak, nor move. Time resumed when Zorua’s drool finally slid off her face and splattered onto your own in a warm, repugnant splat of spittle.

         “What are you doing here?” Sylveon said, focusing on Zorua. She was sure this room was secret!
         “What are you doing here?” Zorua said, gawking at Sylveon. She wasn’t supposed to be back yet!
         “What are you doing here?” Glaceon said, looking at your unfortunate predicament under Zorua’s toes.
         Sylveon was the first to gather her wits. “W-who are you?”
         “I’m—” Zorua quickly cut herself short, “—nuthin’ important. Just, uh…” Zorua trailed off.
         “Y’know, this is a real weird ‘secret’, Sylveon.” Glaceon said. "Why are you hiding a Zorua, again?”
         “I’m wasn’t hiding a Zorua! I was hiding an Eevee!” A realization hit Sylveon as a silk ribbon hastily sped toward her mouth.
         “Unless…”
         “Yes!” You shouted. "The Zorua is the Eevee! The Zorua is the—” You felt the heavy weight of Zorua’s paw silence you. Her soft paw pads did nothing to alleviate the pressure.
         “Stop squeakin’, shrimp.” Zorua said as she cobbled together a tougher facade to challenge the Eeveelutions. “The both of you didn’t see nuthin’.” she said with an adamant glare. "Y'all best be goin', now."
         Sylveon wasn’t having it. “I think I’ve seen quite enough!” she shouted with a Hyper Voice. The sonic impact sent Zorua flying five feet back, releasing you from her grip. She landed on her side with a thud and rolled a couple feet more. Zorua stood, steadied herself, and gritted her teeth. It could’ve been a lot worse. Sylveon could’ve had Pixelate...
         Through gnashed fangs, Zorua spoke, “This ain’t worth it. I’m not gonna get my paws dirty gettin’ a catfight with two technicolor rats,” Zorua slipped her devilish eyes toward you — her contempt clear, “and their vermin.” A sly grin began to show itself. “Although, I could always get paw ‘nother cleanin'. I’ll be seeing you later…” With that, Zorua cloaked herself in an illusion and seemingly vanished. Not a moment passed before a blast of air rushed past you as…
1142222222222221122112222111221221213.title: Pink and Blue to the Rescue!

choices: Sylveon was staring at you, she wanted to talk...
Zorua was staring at you, grinning devilishly...
11422222222222211221122221112212212132.content:
Sylveon and Glaceon were unaware of where Zorua was, but you could feel the carpeted floor beneath your feet shaking as the vixen ran. It was understandable - she had absolutely no chance of winning if she ‘got her paws dirty catchin’ a catfight’, not with two fully-evolved pokemon, one with a clear type advantage, and in a cave full of other Eeveelutions.

The vixen was getting away, you judged by the tremors growing weaker and weaker, until you could no longer feel the ground shaking.

Still shocked about how fast the whole thing was, you looked up at the two Eeveelutions, who, unaware that Zorua had left, were seeking for the dark-type.

"... She's gone." you revealed as you shakily stood up.

For the first time since she came inside, Sylveon seemed to notice you.

"... That really was Eevee, huh?" she asked. You nodded.

The fairy-type gently walked towards you.

"Are you okay?" she asked.
"No! No I'm not okay! It was all-" you had to swallow a lump in your throat, remembering the cruel tortures Zorua had subjected you to.

And so, you proceeded to explain everything the vixen had done to you, from her speech to your stay inside her butt and mouth, and how she had forced you to worship her paws.

By the time you finished your tale, both Glaceon and Sylveon wore looks of pure disgust on their faces.

"Nope... definitely not okay..." Glaceon commented with a hint of a blush on her face, recalling that you've gone through the same things with her earlier... except for the paw-worship part.

"Ew..." Sylveon chimed, shivering in disgust. The pokemon she believed to be an innocent, adorable Eevee had turned out to be an all-but-innocent, perverted Zorua that abused the human.

"I swear I'm not going to help the next Eevee I find out there..." she said, feeling vaguely guilty for the things you've gone through.

"You shouldn't have anyway... not without the rest of us knowing Sylveon," Glaceon scolded, before her gaze shifted on you.

"... Didn't you hear what she said?" you said in fear, recalling her last words, ‘I'll be seeing you later’,
"She's coming back for me! Oh, I'm dead... I just know it..." you whimpered.

Sylveon sighed.

"Let's not be silly... you're safe until you're with m-" a look at Glaceon's face revealed that hers was an unwise choice of words.
"... Us."

Not knowing how to respond, you looked down as you took a good look at yourself, discovering that you were in a pitiful state.

Your whole body was coated in a thick, smelly slime that surely came from Zorua's butt; you were soaked in dried saliva, your shirt was ripped apart, exposing your torso, while your hands - and tongue - were still covered by the fur and the dirt they picked up under Zorua's paws.

No wonder why the two giantesses were disgusted.

You looked up again, discovering one of the four, silky smooth ribbons of Sylveon was coming your way... but it didn't touch you.

It fidgeted nervously in front of you, crafting a small breeze. It was like the ribbon had developed a mind of its own and was too disgusted by the idea of landing anywhere near you, but you knew that those were Sylveon's actual thoughts.

Glaceon knew too. She sighed.

"You need a bath." she broke the silence, suddenly lowering her head towards you.

A memory flashed in your mind,

"Yes. I could do that."

Before you had a chance to cower, Glaceon's teeth closed around the back of your ruined shirt.

She shivered lightly, thinking of all the gross stuff that was on you that was ending up in her mouth.

Mouth full of you, Glaceon mumbled something incomprehensible before turning around and heading out of the secret room that was once occupied by Zorua.

Its current occupant was Sylveon, who looked around dejectedly.

Then, an idea made her smile.

Quickly forgetting about the whole situation, Sylveon headed out too, walking to her room while humming to herself.

--

Your butt hit a cold, hard surface as Glaceon dropped you into the bathroom sink, before turning on the water.

A river of cold liquid came from above, splashing you and your already-soaked clothes.

"So... must've been rough, huh?" Glaceon casually asked, dropping some liquid soap onto you.

"Hm..." you responded, not wanting to risk telling that she hadn't been any better than Zorua... but at least, Glaceon didn't contaminate your mouth for who knew how long...

You remained silent, and started washing yourself instead, pretending to be busily removing the sticky slime and saliva from your body... before finding that you weren't pretending at all.

Unlike the dirt that came off easily, the smelly slime and the dried saliva were hard to remove, you discovered.

You remained under the stream of water for at least thirteen good minutes before finally managing to clean yourself.

Glaceon noticed, and turned the water off, before leaning in the sink and picking you in her mouth once again.

"... How much time have I been with Zorua?" you asked, recalling that you had spent most of the day cooped up inside her butt.

"Well... let's just say it's night now." she said.

You nodded - it was morning when you entered the vixen's hell.

You shivered, feeling the cold emanating from Glaceon's body hitting your still wet body.

The icy giantess sighed.

"... Let's go."

--

None of the Eeveelutions paid particular attention to you during dinner, except maybe for the playful Vaporeon that kept bringing up that face that you have been inside Glaceon's bladder, or the curious Espeon who wondered where you where for the whole day after you went with Sylveon, after she teleported you inside Glaceon's bladder.

Glaceon and Sylveon remained quiet throughout the whole meal, opportunely keeping their minds off things to avoid Espeon finding out what really happened to you.

Eventually, the two ate their meals, along with you - with gigantic food, it wasn't hard for your to feel stuffed - and they started to walk to their respective rooms, Sylveon carrying you along.

"So, we're simply keeping it a secret..." the ice-type mused, causing Sylveon to nod and, by consequence, you to hold onto her head bow since you were riding on top of the pink and white pokemon.

"It's better like this... " she responded, before stopping in front of a door, which, you assumed, led to her room.

"Good night Glaceon..." the fairy-type said as the blue pokemon started walking away after having thanked Sylveon.

"... Hey, where do I sleep?" you suddenly mused, both pokemon suddenly looking at you.

"... Do you want to freeze to death?" Glaceon asked rhetorically, without waiting for an answer as she started walking away, leaving you with a giggling Sylveon.

"Looks like it's just us now..." the fairy-type said, opening the door.

For the first time, you saw her room.

It was occupied mostly by a huge white bed, covered by pink and blue pillows, other pillows scattered around the room.

"Lemme guess, you made this all?" you asked, recalling that she made the curtains in the hallway that led to the secret room.

"Yup... and I made this as well~" she chimed as she approached the bed, picking something up with her ribbons... it was a white, doll-sized shirt.

Before you knew it, the torn shirt had been gotten rid of as it was replaced by the new one.

You blushed.

"... Thanks." you said, causing Sylveon to smile brightly.

"You're welcome! And now..." she said, leaping onto the bed and letting you down from her head.

She smiled as she sat next to you.

"Good night," she said, assuming a comfortable position to sleep.
"And don't worry... nothing will happen." she reassured.

"... Good night, Sylveon," you said, smiling.

Then, you laid down and closed your eyes.

Maybe it was the exhaustive time you spent with Zorua, or the fact that being stuffed made you feel drowsy, but you fell asleep rather quickly.

--

Your eyes shot open.

You didn't mean to wake up - something that you expressed with a yawn.

You felt observed...

Drowsily, you looked around... and you soon understood why you felt watched.

There, in darkness, a pair of blue eyes with white pupils, staring straight at you.

As your own eyes started to adjust to the darkness, you noticed who the eyes belonged to...
11422222222222211221122221112212212132.title: Danger avoided... for now...

choices: You suggest that Zorua might be hiding outside, just like her dream.
Zorua’s gotta be in the den somewhere. She won't expect us to look at night!
Another idea springs into your mind...
114222222222222112211222211122122121321.content:
Sylveon’s eyes illuminated the room with a tranquil blue — glowing softly like a will-o’-wisp were lit from the inside of her eyes. You were no sleuth, but even you could see the subtle signs of worry etched upon her face. You saw the bit of cheek pressed slightly upwards toward her right eye, the faint nervous crinkle around her mouth, and the fact that her big blue eyes didn’t dare to stay on you for more than a second — always slowly drifting away. Despite this, she had a small friendly smile on her face. It was a flimsy mask, doing nothing to hide her worry from you.

         For a few moments, nothing was said. Both of you sat in silence having a wordless conversation with your eyes alone. Eventually, Sylveon mutely mouthed something — her words not having enough courage to leave her throat. Then Sylveon took a deep breath. She closed her eyes briefly, momentarily swallowing the room in darkness. Light returned, she had opened her eyes and was ready to talk.

         “Hey… little buddy,” Sylveon said with a hint of apprehension, “you feel safe, right? Here — with me?” The Pokemon’s big eyes finally focused upon you and it was clear that they refused to veer away until she got her answer.

         You were silent for a long moment. Even you didn’t completely know the answer. Even with Zorua still prowling around out there somewhere, just being near Sylveon diluted the feeling of danger. Her voice was soothing, her character calming — Sylveon simply radiated an aura of serenity. She was almost motherly, in a sort of way.

         But your fears did not abate. The reason was simple: you were in a land of giants. How could you ever not be at least a little afraid? You were powerless to stop ne'er-do-wells like Zorua. You had to entirely rely on others for your protection: Glaceon, Sylveon. They’ve already been fooled once, who’s to say they won’t be tricked again?

         You were hoisted out of your thoughts as Sylveon’s chiming voice severed the thick silence.

         “You’ve been thinking for a long time…” Sylveon’s eyes peeled away from you to look dejectedly downward, her head followed. The fairy’s silken ribbons hung listlessly and somberly, moving ever-slightly with an ambient breeze. “This wasn’t the answer I was hoping for.” she said unusually cheerlessly. She let out a small sigh. The sleek white bed covers billowed in response to the warm air, the ripples traveling like a white, wavy crest of water before fluttering out — its energy lost.

         Sylveon regained her composure and mustered the will to look towards you. “Little one, I had a bad dream. Everything was just like it was right now, except you weren’t here. You were gone and I didn’t know where you went. I checked under the covers, under the bed, under the pillows — you weren’t in my room. Then I checked Glaceon’s room, Flareon’s, Espeon’s, and all the other’s too — not there either. Only when I checked Leafeon’s garden, did I find out what happened." Sylveon eyes briefly looked toward the ground, as if recreating the moment in animus.

"Your cute little shirt was left in the dirt, soiled and abandoned, and Zorua’s pawprint beside it.” Sylveon’s blue eyes began to glisten with gargantuan tears. “I messed up again. I thought you were safe and I just didn’t see it coming. That’s the worst of it all!”

         “Sylveon…” you begin to say, “That’s just a dream. That’d... never happen.” An awkward pause betrays you. Yet, a genuine smile returned to Sylveon’s face.

         “I know you’re afraid. I am too. But I get it now! We gotta stay positive. If we want to sleep well again, we gotta find Zorua. And how are we going to do that, little one?”
114222222222222112211222211122122121321.title: A Solemn Chat With the Cotton Candy Fairy

choices: A pair of blue eyes was staring at you from a bush. Zorua was there!
There was nothing. The garden was apparently deserted...
Someone suddenly came out, but it wasn't Zorua...
1142222222222221122112222111221221213211.content:
You thought for a while, where Zorua could be hiding?

You distinctly remembered her words, ‘I'll be seeing you later’, meaning that she couldn't be far from the cave, no?

But where was she...?

"... You mentioned Leafeon's garden?" you recalled, instinctively looking at the shirt Sylveon made for you.

The fairy perked up.

"Are you saying...?" you nodded your head,
"Zorua might be hiding there for real," you confirmed. For a moment, you imagined the dreaded vixen, laying in the shadows, waiting for the proper moment to steal her slave back.

But that couldn't happen while you were with Sylveon or Glaceon, could it? You forced yourself to believe it, but you really couldn't shake off the feeling that you were going to clean another paw with your tongue if you didn't found Zorua.

Sylveon seemed to somehow read your thoughts as she finally stood up, a determined smile on her face,

"Maybe you are right," she spoke.

One of her four ribbons traveled to you as it coiled around your waist and brought you up in the air, until you landed on top of the giant's head. You got what was about to happen, so you hastily moved to Sylveon's head bow and grabbed a hold of it

"We're going to find Zorua! She won't bother our sleeps again!" she said almost cheerfully, respecting her earlier statement about being positive.

Up went your world as Sylveon leaped from the bed to the ground, your fingers almost sank into the silky smooth bow in the process.

The fairy took a moment to stretch, before she started walking.

One of her ribbons opened the door as she exited her room, stepping into the spacious hallway that led to her room and, judging by the direction she took, to Glaceon's room.

"Okay, Leafeon's garden is right this way..." Sylveon mumbled, mostly to herself, as she started walking again.

"... Shouldn't we wake Glaceon up? She could help..." you pointed out. Sylveon took another step, before she slowed down a bit, considering your suggestion.

But then, the ground beneath you oscillated right-to-left and left-to-right as she simply shook her head.

"I can handle Zorua if she doesn't use those annoying illusions..." she stated.

"... You know she's totally going to use those annoying illusions, right?" again, Sylveon slowed down but this time, her head moved up and down as she nodded to herself.

The fairy allowed herself to sigh as she rounded a corner and continued.

"... We're both afraid of what she might do to you. But she won't take you as long as you're with me." she said, offering a determined smile, though you couldn't see it.

Finally, the hallway came to an end as the white and pink giantess, whose fur seemed to shine through the darkness, stepped in a big, circular space that reminded you of a clearing. There were a few doors, but the stone wall was mostly occupied by a large glass door; through the glass, you noted a huge indoor garden. And huge not only from your point of view.

"... I'm still wondering how you made this all." you said.

Sylveon smirked. One of her ribbons pointed to a door on the side,
"That's Leafeon's room." she pointed to another door,
"That's Vaporeon's, she helps Leafeon watering the plants and-"

"Sylveon, we aren't here for the tour!" you interrupted, causing her smirk to contort into a serious expression again.

"Right. Sorry."

Silently, she walked up to the glass door. One of her ribbons gently pushed it open. The fairy-type stepped on the tickling grass of Leafeon's garden, which made you feel like you were back in the forest where Espeon picked you up.

The only difference were the colorful flowers and the rose bushes that jumped out every once in awhile.

The quiet fairy-type started moving around, careful to not crush dead leaves beneath her paws.

"We need to be careful," she whispered,
"If Zorua sees or hears us, she could flee. There's a backdoor here, she can run straight out of the den from there..."

"... What if she's already out?" you wondered out loud,
"Like your dream?"

Sylveon stopped.

"Hmm... it might be, but it's worth searching the garden first,"

Sylveon began walking around, watching her steps, while you held your breath, afraid that Zorua could be able to hear it.

Sylveon carefully examined the bushes, checked in the patches of high grass and behind a few trees, but Zorua seemed to be nowhere in the garden.

To make things worse, the process was incredibly slow, and it was completely dark. You could swear you saw the silhouette of a small fox sneaking around a few times.

The pokemon you whose head you were riding on eventually stopped.

"... I don't think she's here. She might be outside..." she theorized once again as she started moving, knowing what awaited her in the dark forest: bigger trees, taller grass and the chance of encountering nocturnal predators that could easily take her on to get the tiny human she was protecting.

You remained silent as the fairy-type trotted towards a small door.

Just before she approached it, though, you heard a sound... the sound of plants shaking.

Your first thought was that the wind was shaking them... before you realized that you were inside, there was no wind.

"Sylveon..." you called, startled.

The fairy had already stopped. Apparently, she heard the sound too. It made sense, her ears very big, two pillars of white fur that towered above you.

Slowly, very slowly, Sylveon turned her head, while forcing you to turn yours - along with your whole body - towards the direction where the sound came from...
1142222222222221122112222111221221213211.title: Premonitory dream?

choices: Zorua casted another illusion and fled!
1142222222222221122112222111221221213211.content:
Your heart stopped completely; on the other hand, Sylveon's started beating faster.

A good while where nothing was said and the only sound that could be heard was the breathing of the pixie holding you. Yours seemed to have stopped.

There, in darkness, hidden by a bush, was a pair of ice-blue eyes, staring straight at Sylveon.

And, of course, at you.

But, noticing that she was discovered, Zorua walked out of her hiding spot, looking at Sylveon defiantly.

"Hmph. What're ya doin' out of bed?" she said with contempt as she eyed the small door Sylveon had intended to reach, ready to run.

"I dunno... there's an impostor lurking in our den?" Sylveon replied sarcastically as she and Zorua started walking in circles, like two wolves ready to tear each other to pieces.

For the same reason: you.

Sylveon wanted to protect you; Zorua wanted her butt plug/paw cleaner/slave back.

Like reading Zorua's mind, Sylveon wrapped two of her ribbons around you protectively; you were doing your best to hide behind her head bow.

You felt like something was going to happen very, very soon.

Your suppositions turned out to be true as Zorua, having reached a favorable position after her short walk, suddenly shot a Shadow Ball at Sylveon, who blocked it with two of her bows, before looking at the dark-type vixen... who had disappeared, cloaked in an illusion.

Sylveon thought fast while she felt you shivering in fear on her head.

The fairy-type took action: a pink mist formed around her, before spreading across the garden as Sylveon performed Misty Terrain.

She knew, that would make it harder for her to spot Zorua, but it would also make it harder for Zorua to find the door and/or her.

"Don't worry, I've got this!" Sylveon chimed, the grip of her ribbons tightening around you.

The pixie carefully walked while looking around the pink mist, trying to spot Zorua.

Luckily, her search didn't take too long; after only a few minutes, Sylveon spotted the silhouette of a vixen in the mist. You swallowed a lump in your throat.

Quietly, she approached it, and her two free ribbons darted forward; but, as soon as they made contact with the figure, it vanished.

Sylveon groaned - it was an illusion.

From your perch on Sylveon's head, you turned your own head, scanning the area in search of the dark-type threatening your safety - was it your imagination or air seemed to be moving towards you over there?

"Syl-" you tried to call for the pixie in alert, when your world became hot and smelly.

"OW!" you heard Sylveon crying in pain as something bit her ribbons, snatching you from her head along with them.

You had quite the idea of what was going on, and you were utterly terrified by it.

In a second, Zorua opened her mouth as Sylveon retreated her ribbons, letting go of you in the process; you found yourself hovering in mid-air for a split second, before you were once again enclosed in Zorua's mouth.

"No!" Sylveon cried as she ran towards you. To her, it appeared like you were sitting in mid-air, but she knew what was happening.

Sadly, Zorua was quick and cloaked you in the same illusion, making you disappear from eyesight.

Hastily, the vixen turned around and started running: she had her slave back, now nothing could keep her from fleeing from the garden's back door.

If only it wasn't for this annoying mist - how long did Misty Terrain last?

"Sylveon! Over here!" you shouted while you were being thrown back and forth the insides of Zorua as she ran.

You had to help Sylveon find you!

Sadly, Zorua's large tongue rose as the vixen smacked you with, a slick whip that stroke your upper body.
