A tsunami of fluid crashed into you like an unstoppable wake. A heart-melting tingle washed over Zorua. Her tongue free from the confines of her mouth, her privates throbbed as she came.
         Afterwards, she sat there. Her bushy tail brushed the carpeted floor as she basked in the afterglow.
         “That rat is good.” She had to get out of here. If she avoided the Eeveelutions and managed to keep you… the fun would never end! But how can she escape? What was her next course of action?
1142222222222221122112222111221221213332.title: 'Nuthin But a Toy

choices: You managed to give Zorua the slip! Now just to hide somewhere...
You ran into Sylveon and the others! Safety!
1142222222222221122112222111221221213332.content:
Uncertainty overwhelmed your whole body, which was still dripping with sticky, foul-smelling saliva coming straight from the Zorua's mouth.

Definitely, you didn't want to submit to her, but what other choice did you have? Hiding was out of question, and running...

"What're you waitin' for, shrimp? Hurry up, unless ya want me to get... creative." the gigantic vixen said, once more displaying a devilish grin on her muzzle.

You didn't reply as you thought.

Running wasn't certainly the most dignifying thing to do, but Zorua did state she was feeling tired, and there were still three Eeveelutions out there searching for her.

If you just played your cards right...

"Well?" Zorua asked once more, beginning to lose her patience, though not losing her smirk,
"Time's almost up, bug. Ten... nine..." she maliciously began a countdown.

However, you interrupted her by the count of 'six', in which point you spoke, defiant,

"You want fire in your blood?" you asked rhetorically, taking a step back,
"Yeah, not happening." Zorua frowned for a moment at the mention, before smirking again, amused by your act of defiance, which she would enjoy crushing; she opened her mouth to speak, but you spoke before she could,
"However, I have other methods to get you wet."

"What's that supposed to m-hey!" Zorua exclaimed with another frown as she saw you turning and sprinting away while she was still standing on her hind legs,
"Where d'ya think you're goin', ya rat?"

A boom erupted from behind you, confirming that the vixen fell back on all fours; you ignored her and kept going at your top speed, headed for the door, not stopping even when you heard booming steps behind you - Zorua was giving chase.

However, she was having a hard time keeping track you, whose body nearly disappeared within the strands of the creamy carpet.

You sped up. No matter what was going to happen, you were NOT going to become a pet for this vixen. After all, what did distinguish you from one was your brain, which would free you of Zorua's torment if everything went as planned.

Frowning, with her teeth gritted, the dark-type watched your small body reach the door, round the corner and disappear.

"Get back here ya vermin!" she growled as she ran straight for the door, though feeling tired.

Crafting illusions took a lot of energy from her, and the fact she had to keep moving to avoid Eeveelutions didn't help at all; unlike her, you were feeling adrenaline flowing through your veins.

Your life probably depended on your success, and that thought made you keep going even though you were feeling your breath rapidly running short and your legs growing tired.

Zorua still didn't give up though, and kept chasing you through the hall of the cave that Sylveon showed you before.

More or less, you knew how to get out of here, but that wasn't your main concern; right now, your main concern was having Zorua run straight into her chasers.

If you were lucky enough, you could find Sylveon, Espeon and Glaceon before Zorua caught you.

"I'm gonna catch ya, bug! If ya stop now, I'm gonna go easy on ya!" she warned, keeping up though not gaining any ground despite the size difference.

"Dream on!" you snapped back in a bout of courage as you kept running.

Soon you were running into the candlelit you were shown before.

And, at the end of the of the hall, a bright red furry creature, busy blowing a flame out of his mouth and onto a candle... yeah, Flareon's help wouldn't be of any help protecting you, though he could help in another way.

You sprinted right past him while Zorua, who noticed the fire-type as well, had to think of something...

Hearing steps echoing into the hall, Flareon turned his head to the side and noted... another Flareon coming his way.

"Oh, hey me! Still saving the future?" he dumbly asked, still believing what the disguised Zorua told him earlier.

"Yeah, yeah, gotta go! And keep your yap shut!" Zorua replied as she sprinted past the oblivious fire-type, who blinked.

While still running, Zorua grunted, feeling tired because of yet another illusion she had to craft to save her tail. She had completely forgotten the other Eeveelutions were still out, all doing their thing save for three that were on her tail.

In a flash, your plan dawned on Zorua and she gritted her fangs. It was those same Eeveelutions you were counting on.

She had to be careful, or she would... stick to her original plan, with the difference she would be thrown out empty-handed instead of leaving on her legs with you.

Panting, she shot you a look, watching as you ran farther.

"Damn ya, ya sneaky rat..." she uttered as she kept going.

She couldn't go on for much longer; little she did know that neither could you.

If you couldn't get her to lose you, you were gonna eventually get caught. If only you could find a nice little hole for yourself where Zorua couldn't possibly fit...

Sweat ran down your face as you felt yourself starting to slow down.

'What to do?'
1142222222222221122112222111221221213332.title: Not a pet for pokemon

choices: "... Play something? It'll be fun." she suggests with a wink.
"... get something to eat? I'm starving." she states.
114222222222222112211222212.content:
As much as you want to spend more time with the gigantic, white and pink pokemon you're currently riding on, a voice in your head tells you to go and check on Glaceon.

You give as small sigh, having taken a decision.
"Sylveon..." you call out.
"What? Have you decided?" she asks, her voice sickeningly sweet. Is she doing it just to convince you to go with her?

You shake your head.
"Hey, could you... take me... to Glaceon's room? Please?" you ask, trying to not sound embarrassed. Which obviously doesn't work. Sylveon seems to don't notice your sheepish voice though.
"Why?" she asks instead, with a not subtle hint of delusion in her eyes.
"We-well.... you see, I have something to say her..." you lie, your cheeks getting of a faint shade of pink.

Sylveon stares at you curiously for a few seconds, before smiling.
"Well, if that's so, I don't see why not." she replies with a sugary voice, before starting to walk; she soon brings you in front of a door. One of her ribbon like feelers wraps around your body and brings you to the ground.
"Guess I'll give you that tour later." Sylveon says, patting your head with a ribbon. Then, she walks off.

You wait for Sylveon to be completely out of your eyesight, before turning to the skyscraper sized door.
"Uhhhhh..." you mutter under your breath, trying to find a way to get inside. Knocking is out of question, Glaceon would never hear it, and even though her big ears, you're too small to produce an audible sound by knocking.

You get an idea. You look at the crack under the door. It looks pretty tight, but you should be able to squeeze yourself under it.

It takes you a few minutes, as the crack is tighter than you had anticipated, but you finally manage to get inside Glaceon's room. You feel like you just entered a fridge. The mostly warm air from the cavern disappeared , replaced by a chilling atmosphere.

Sitting on a light blue bed, a blue creature is with her back to you. You clear your throat. Two big ears rise as Glaceon turns around, showing a light blue flower that glows soothingly... you realize that it's completely made out of ice! You look around the room, which is apparently almost completely filled with similar sculptures.

"Nice, aren't they?" Glaceon asks calmly, almost embarrassed, while getting closer to you. Soon you find yourself staring right at two immense fluffy paws, a chilly aura emanated from them.
"Uh, yes... pretty..." you state.

The next moments are followed by an awkward silence, before finally Glaceon breaks it.
"L-Look I'm sorry about earlier. I..." she shuts up.
"Don't worry, I forgive you..." you reply. Glaceon gives out a small smile, lowering her face. One of her forepaws pushes on your back, shoving your right into her fluffy cheek as she nuzzles.

"Thank you." she whispers. Even when you're being smothered between her paw and her cheek, you manage to smile a little. She then pulls off and opens her mouth. Her sharp fangs shine like the many ice sculptures placed around within the room.
"Glaceon, what..." her mouth closes around the back of your shirt, lifting you off the ground. The ice type leaps on her bed and lets you fall in front of her.

You spend some time chatting with Glaceon, about your life before you shrunk, and about her life with her siblings. And, from what you get from what she told you, she always has been an eternal rival of Espeon.
"But you probably already figured out with the prank of earlier." she says you. You just nod, the horrible sensation of being crushed in between titanic walls of flesh, while being drenched in piss is still fresh in your mind.

"So..." she says after a bit.
"...I've told you about my life, and I'm pretty sure you have no more to add about yours, so why don't we...
114222222222222112211222212.title: Refuse - check if Glaceon's fine.

1142222222222221122112222122.content:
"I didn't get a chance to each much with your... interruption earlier," she pauses, then shakes her head, "I don't blame you for that. I'd probably have done the same if it meant staying alive... Well, after attempting to freeze their insides. Anyways, I'd take a guess and say you must be hungry, too."
          Almost as if her words were a cue, your stomach growled, reminding you that you had yet to eat since at this had started. Without hesitation, you offer the massive Ice-type a nod, "I would love that right now."
          Glaceon gives you rather warm smile, for an Ice-type, and begins to reach down to pick you up. Seeing her glinting ganga again, you take a step back.
          "Um, could you try carrying me a different way? I know that grabbing me with your mouth is easier for you, but I'm a little worried about your teeth tearing through my clothes," yoy manage, not wanting to add that swinging about with nothing below you was slightly terrifying.
          Glaceon paused for a moment, then shrugged, "I suppose. Obviously, I don't really have anything else to carry you with."
          "Maybe I could ride on your back?"
          Glaceon considered the option for a moment, "You could, yes. Doubt it would be very comfortable for you, though. I am an Ice-type, after all."
          Recalling what you knew about Glaceon's species and hoping you were right, you ask, "Can't you control your body temperature?"
          "I can, but it gets uncomfortable for me if I get too warm. Why do you think it's as cool as it is in here?" The Ice-type nods at her room in general, "Outside of this room, I have to make an effort to keep the area around me cold enough to be comfortable."
          You think this over a bit, trying to find a middle ground, but come up empty. Either Glaceon carries you with her mouth for you ride on her cold back. Forunately for you, Glaceon makes the decision.
          "Look, I already told you I'm starving. I'll carry you my way this time. If something goes wrong, we'll do something else next time. Alright?" Not waiting for your reply, Glaceon snagged you and began padding off.
          You swung a bit as Glaceon pushed her door open, though it was the absolutely bone-breaking height that bother you over the movement. Not wanting to consider what would happen if you fell, you resort to looking around instead.
          The walls were rather simple, but the candle-holding sconces that decorated every few feet were far from it. They were rather elegant. In addition, a number of various cloth object hung from the wall, each beautifully made. According to what Glaceon had told you, Sylveon made those.
          You didn't have much more time to observe as Glaceon place you onto the table the group had been eating from (though this is the first time you're properly seeing it.)
          "Stay here. I'd get us something."
          You raise your hand and look around, "Not very many places I can go like this."
          "Good point," she offers the complement as she padded as off, leaving you to wait for her to return.
1142222222222221122112222122.title: Hanging along with Glaceon

choices: "...I'd love to have a little fun. Let's go."
"...I'd like to find Sylveon. She wanted to show me something."
11422222222222211221122221221.content:
It was rather quiet, waiting for Glaceon to come back. You half expected Sylveon to show up and offer to give you her tour again. However, you were left undisturbed until your Ice-type... friend? Yeah, she seemed friendly enough. Glaceon returned, carrying a number of berries.
          Glaceon pushed a rather large (to you) Oran berry over to where you were waiting, "Here you are. Enjoy," without waiting, Glaceon immediately started on her collection of berries.
          After watching the pale blue Pokemon eat for a moment, you go to take bite out of your own berry. Only to find that it feels as though you were trying to bite through a ball of concrete. Furthermore, it was very cold. After pulling back, you notice Glaceon watching you with a grin. She bursted out laughing a moment later.
          "Oh, your face! Ah ha ha! Your face!" She pushes a second berry over to you, "Ha ha, don't worry. That one isn't frozen," she snags the frozen berry and promptly chomps it down without hesitation.
          You hesitate before taking a bite out of the Sitrus berry she had now given you. As promised, this one wasn't frozen. It also had a father nice, well-rounded taste to it.
          Oddly enough, something fortunate is your small size, meaning that one berry is far, far more than you need. By the time you'd eaten your fill of the massive berry, Glaceon was done and watching you eat. Seeing that you had finished, she snagged your partially eaten and finished it herself.
          "Mmm. Nice picks, right? Leafeon really does do a nice job with these. Now, if she could figure out how to not be so timid."
          You offer a shrug, "Not sure about the timid part, but the berry was good. Except the frozen one."
          "Oh, come on. I was just having a little fun. Speaking of, what do you say to having a little fun in my room?" She offers a small wink.
          You take a moment to decide. Glaceon clearly liked you. Who knows, maybe she might be more willing to help you out of this situation if you accept. The problem is that you have an idea what she wanted. Were you willing to go that far? Alternatively, you could see if Glaceon would take you to Sylveon. After all, the Fairy-type did want to give you a tour. Might be useful.
          "I think..."
11422222222222211221122221221.title: A Quick Meal

choices: -to stay in Glaceon's room and do something.
-to head out and see what else you two can get up to.
114222222222222112211222212211.content:
At your words, Glaceon offered a rather grim sounding chuckle, "Eager, are you? I like it," without any further preamble, Glaceon snatched you up and began padding back to her room.
         Now once again hanging from Glaceon's mouth (the ground seemed so far away!), you had ample time to consider what you had just agreed to. What would Glaceon do with you? Had you made a horrible mistake? She seemed nice enough, but then again... She did eat you without a second thought.
         Unfortunately, you didn't have as much time as you'd hoped. Plenty enough to worry about your predicament, but far from enough to decide what to do about it. Glaceon pushed her door open before hopping onto her bed and rather gently setting you down. You're not sure why, but you had half-expected her to drop you.
         Certain that Glaceon was going to tell you what she wanted, you decided to speak first, if only to make sure Glaceon knew you wanted a say in things, "So, what do you want to do that's... fun?"
         The Ice-type gave a short laugh, "What's with the hesitation? I wanted to see how you were at ice sculpting."
         Ice sculpting? You didn't expect that, "Just ice sculpting? Nothing else?"
         "Did you expect me to play naughty with you?" She asked, her voice teasing and playful, "I'll admit. If I hadn't been trying to eat and not expecting it, I'd probably have enjoyed the feeling of you inside me earlier... Before Espeon's prank, anyways. But let's be honest here. We barely know each other. I'd prefer if we kept things neutral for now, alright?" Glaceon's expression and tone seemed serious, then she cracked a grin, "Unless you insist, of course. I mean, I do want to be a good host. We may barely know each other, but we can fix that!" She gives a rather dismissive laugh, leaving you unsure if that was actually an option.
         You nodded, a little relieved. So she wouldn't make you do anything like that just yet. Good. However, before you could say something else, your furry friend was speaking again, "Of course, if ice sculpting isn't your speed, we don't have to stay in my room. I, for one, would love to get Espeon back. Maybe you and I could cook something up?"
         Well, that's great. You'd barely made a rather hard decision, and now you have another one to make. Stay in the room and do something, be it ice sculpting or not, or leave the room and see what you can get up to, like pranking Espeon. Or you can stay and take a risk to see how serious Glaceon was with her offer about being naughty. After a moment of consideration, you decide-
114222222222222112211222212211.title: In the Cold of Dilemma

choices: You want to give ice sculpting a try.
You have something else in mind.
1142222222222221122112222122111.content:
"I'd rather stay here," you manage to say, "Ice sculpting sounds interesting."
         Your words drew a smile out of Glaceon, "It is. And it's quite relaxing. But... hmm, you're going to have a bit of trouble doing it my way."
         "'Your way?'"
         Glaceon gave a nod, then turned away from you a little. While she was now giving you a wonderful view of her flanks, you doubted that was the reason she turned away. And you were right.
         She took a rather deep breath, then released it, spewing torrent of snow, ice, and ice-cold air. Rather than use her Icy Wind to assault an entire battlefield, however, she focused it in front of herself. As she did, the snow and ice began clumping together. After a few moments of letting it clump, she stopped and began brushing some snow away and occasionally even started biting some pieces. After a few moments of scrutiny at what looked to you like a very lumpy mass, Glaceon started using Icy Wind again.
         After several more Icy Winds and brushings, you were able to at least identify what it looked like. Glaceon had made a round base upon which nine four-legged figures stood, sat, or were laying. Glaceon nodded to herself and glanced over at you.
         "Guess what I'm making yet?"
         "Is it you and your siblings?" You guessed. Glaceon had said there were nine of them, including her, so it felt like a safe bet. And the right one, if Glaceon's nod said anything.
         "Yep. Might give Espeon a bigger head, but yes. Felt like making a family sculpture and sticking it somewhere cool."
         You give a shiver- the room was rather cold- before asking, "Won't it melt outside of here?"
         Glaceon shook her head, her tail flicking to the side rather nonchalantly, "Not if I put it in the right place. Or if I make sure it keeps together... Though you would be right, otherwise."
         "Your family is big. And rather... colorful."
         Glaceon gave a sharp laugh, "Yes. Yes, they are. Honestly, I can already guess how they'd react to seeing this. Eevee would be excited. Flareon would just ignore it because he always does. Jolteon would question me on it. Vaporeon'd want a life-size version, but only because of a bad joke. Espeon would make an annoying comment about how someone's tail or something isn't right. Umbreon would compliment my skills. Leafeon would study it quietly and might work up the courage to say if she liked it. And Sylveon would comment on how cute it is."
         "Y-You know your au-audience well."
         The Ice-type turned her gaze to you after hearing your stuttered acknowledgement, "Is something wrong?"
         "C-Cold."
         Glaceon sighed, but nodded again, "Right. You aren't an Ice-type. Alright. If you want to try ice sculpting, we can go somewhere a little warmer. And I've figured out how you can do it, too. Of course, if you want to do something else, you can just say so."
1142222222222221122112222122111.title: Eeveelutions in Ice

choices: Don't quit your day job. You are a horrible ice sculptor.
You could be the Michaelangelo of ice sculpting.
11422222222222211221122221221111.content:
"I-I do want to tr-try ice sculpting. I-It's just c-cold!" You managed to stutter. The cold was getting to you.
          Glaceon rolled her eyes, but you noticed the hint of a smile touching her lips, "Come on, then. Let's get you somewhere a bit warmer," she reached down and grabbed hold of you yet again.
          You found yourself hanging from the Ice-type's mouth yet again. While it was certainly uncomfortable (what if your clothes gave way!), you found yourself slightly less bother by it. Slightly, and only because it was Glaceon. She may have eaten you before, but she was seemed much friendlier now. You felt certain that you could reasonably trust her not to try to hurt you again.
          Of course, while you considered this, the Ice-type was on the move. You gently swung in Glaceon's mouth as she carried you through her and her siblings' home. You weren't sure where she was going, but she seemed to be walking slower than normal. Perhaps for your sake?
          Either way, she didn't take too long to get to where she was going as she set you down in a small, unlit corner of... some room. You weren't quite sure what the room's purpose was, but you could definitely see why Glaceon had taken you here. It was cool- though nothing compared to Glaceon's room or the Eeveelution herself- and rather isolated. Here, you two could ice sculpt without interruption.
          "Here we are. This should do. Now for the ice," Glaceon allowed her eyes to close. You watched her concentrate, then took a step back as the air around her rapidly grew colder. Fortunately, it didn't stay that way for long. A small block of ice (for her, anyways. The thing was as big as you!) formed in front of her, "There. Give it a try."
          You looked up at her, "I'd love to, but I can't shape ice with my bare hands."
          She sighed, then gestured at the floor, "You don't think that's rather obvious, [y/n]? Look around you. There are plenty of little chips of rock around here. Maybe they might possibly, potentially, be useful?" She gave you a cocky grin and made a shooing gesture with her paw.
          With a sigh of your own, you scavenged about. Turns out, she was right. There are plenty of rocks that could function as makeshift hammers and chisels. When you return with your implements, she nods.
          "There you go. Now, give it a try."
11422222222222211221122221221111.title: To the place where ice shall be sculpted!

choices: I could be the bigger perso"n
114222222222222112212.content:
In a flash of light you were out of the bowels of the ice type. You found yourself face to face with your old "friend" espeon. Behind you glaceon is gasping for breath, not having been able to breath when you tickled her. Once the glaceon could breath again she sat up and addressed espeon. "Thanks. I don't think you were gonna do it for a bit there."

"I only did it so
114222222222222112212.title: Agreeing

1142222222222221122121.content:
Espeon immediately brought you to her mouth, and threw you inside roughly. Luckily you didn't hit your head on her teeth, but your head did land in the back of her throat.
The psychic type licked at your lower half for a moment, and you could feel her head moving around as she returned to her seat at the table. After a few minutes of this her mouth opened again, and you struggled to turn around so you could climb out, but you were instead met with a hot cup of tea. The liquid washed you into into her throat, it was unbearably hot, but not burning. The psychic type swallowed you, and carried you down into her depths. It didn't feel as cramped on the way down as when glaceon swallowed you. The first time your face was mashed up against the walls of the throat, but this time you were encapsuled within a liquid, so you barely brushed the sides all the way down.
After about five seconds of going down you were emptied out into Espeons stomach. Once again espeons insides we're different in contents, as this time it was already full of food. The stomach was slowly churning at the giant mass of mush that you were sinking into, you tried desperately to climb the walls and avoid it but there was no leverage you could find.
You stopped sinking in at your ribs, and you did your best to not fall over and have your head sink in. Every now and then more food and tea would empty down on you, and the level of the hoop slowly rose until it was at your neck. You could hear Espeon and the others talking outside, laughing at the incident at you and glaceons expense.
Once Espeon was finished eating she patted her belly lightly, sending a ringing din around her insides for you. She then returned to her room and went to bed, causing the contents of her stomach to turn over as she laid down on her side, completely covering you. You scramble back to the surface as quickly as you can. You hear gentle snoring from the thick walls around you, and you deduce that she's fallen asleep already. This is your chance to try and force your way up her throat. You try and try, but to no avail. The sphincter is closed too tightly. Which only leaves two options.
1142222222222221122121.title: I could eat him myself "

choices: She wakes up and goes to the bathroom.
11422222222222211222.content:
The dark tunnel surrounding you undulated and squeezed at your form. You felt the digestive system's slow progress over you as the smells and sounds changed. Slowly, slowly, the beating sound got quieter as you moved away from the heart. The rumblings of the stomach, too, became fainter as you were pushed along the winding passage. The overpowering sour smell waned as stomach acid got neutralized by bile, and the unpleasantly bitter taste was constant on your tongue. You were no longer wet, but the sticky mucus was ever present that lubricated you.


"I'm not very hungry. I'll just have some water."

Vaporeon's ears perked at the mention of water. "I can take care of that!"

"No you can't." urged glaceon, pulling her blue glass out of Vaporeon's reach just as he was about to grab it. She walked over to the sink, filled it to the brim, and topped off the glass with ice using her powers. Cooly she downed the glass in a single swig, then filled it back up. The chatter at the table quieted as, one by one, the eeveelutions took notice of the constant sound of flowing water and Glaceon's growing belly.

"Wow you sure do like water." quipped Vaporeon happily.

"Um, Glacey, isn't that enough?" Leafeon asked, concerned. The icy blue Pokemon's belly was distended and round; she looked 12 months pregnant.

"I think—" she hiccuped and put a paw to her mouth "I think I know when I've had enough." She finished the contents of her glass and set it down. Ugh I've had enough she sighed quietly under her breath, and started towards her bedroom.


The pressure around you had increased greatly over the last few minutes. And what's that constant gurgling sound? The hours—or minutes, it's hard to tell when you have nothing to tell the time by—that you've spent in the intestines had been sweltering and rather dry but now it's quite wet. And it's getting wetter by the minute. You pull your arm from your side, the mucus faintly crackling, and run a hand underneath you. No, it's not your imagination; it definitely is water and it's cool to the touch. You rock your body to the side quite freely and realize that it's no longer so cramped. In fact, you might even be able to get onto your hands and knees and crawl forward. Is this the large intestine already? Yes. Yes, it very well might be. But all this water...where's it coming from?


Glaceon turns in her sleep, letting out a gentle grunt of discomfort. The water inside her belly sloshes.
11422222222222211222.title: Glaceon isn't hungry. She just has a glass ...

choices: Glaceon looks in the toilet and notices you.
Glaceon leaves the bathroom not noticing you; Sylveon comes in.
114222222222222112221.content:
The moon rose from behind an immense peak of snow and ice. Her sure feet slipped mid-stride and Glaceon slid belly first on the slippery ground. She got back up as quickly as possible but try as she might she could not move her legs fast enough to regain her speed. The rumbling avalanche that chased her was only three feet away...then two...then one. She screamed as the raging snow put its massive weight on her, she was going to burst, but suddenly something very warm was on her thigh.

Glaceon woke from her nightmare and quickly got to her feet. The pressure in her bladder was urgent and the small puddle near her foot was proof. With great laboring steps, but completely silent as not to wake anyone in the house, she tip-toed as best she could on four legs towards the bathroom.

To her horror the door was shut and light danced in the crack between the floor and the door. She rapped on the door quickly and with some force.

"Open up. Now!! I need to go!!" She whispered loudly while crossing her legs.

"Who is that?" A voice responded. It was Flareon. "Is that you Umbreon?"

"GLA-CE-ON!!" She spoke her name angrily.

"Oh it's you." He put a sour tone on the you. "Come back later, I'm brushing my fur."

It was no use. He's always been a jerk to her and she's always returned the favor. She'll be sure to throw his brush in the toilet tomorrow but right now she was going to have to use the other bathroom.

Blue paws hurriedly skidded across the wood floor and a pink bedroom door decorated with a ribbon silhouette rushed open.

"What! Who is th--!!"

"Sorry—Sylveon—need—your—bathroom!!" She slammed his toilet door and turned on the light switch. Her eyes stung from the sudden brightness but she crouched over the low toilet and finally unclenched her lower muscles. The relief was instantaneous. Clear liquid splashed with force against the opposite side of the porcelain and a loud sigh of satisfaction left Glaceon's mouth.

The water had gone completely through her. What she did not anticipate at all was that, because she had drunk so much, most of it had actually filled her entire gut as well. Two minutes later after the stream had reduced to a trickle she realized the secondary pain that had been assuaged by the first. This wasn't going to be pretty. She winced and relaxed her sphincter.



The pressure around you was suddenly gone, and then increased dramatically. A spot of light grew and rushed towards you. Just before you were completely in the light, a meaty ring clenched around you, only one arm and your head managed to escape. You looked around and from what you could make out in the sudden burning brightness was a giant flat blue tail quavering above you and what was obviously the large pink pulsing tailhole clenching you in place. It suddenly opened again and you fell freely into a giant pool in the middle of a large white bowl.



The water coming out of her was hot and came out in spurts as she clenched her belly muscles. The pressures were uncontrollable, unlike her bladder, and not all of it was making it into the toilet she sorrowfully realized when she heard a splash on the floor, the sound of a toilet plunger falling over, and even a roll of toilet paper falling into the toilet.

"Hey what are you doing in there! You know why I banned Vaporeon from my room don't you!"

Glaceon rolled her eyes. Sylveon was new here and he was kind of a neat freak. Recently Vaporeon had drawn a bath for himself in Sylveon's washroom but had forgotten to turn the tap off. It went unnoticed until water started flooding in under the door, ruining the carpet. Glaceon winced again as a torrent of water left her bowels and splashed into the toilet.



It wasn't pleasant to say the least, but it beat the tight confines of her guts. It smelled vaguely or urine and small flecks of brown dotted the water. Time to swim to freedom, you thought. But the walls were too steep and slippery! No matter where you trying to grab, you slipped back down. But just as you were about to give up hope, you noticed the big roll of toilet paper, nearly submerged, bobbing up and down in the water. You grabbed onto the soggy thing and climbed as high as you could onto it. You looked up and saw Glaceon's anus bulge again. Another gush of water poured out and the water level rose.

If I could just reach... The handle of the toilet plunger was almost within grasp. The tips of your fingers touched wood and just like that it was out of your grasp again.

Glaceon ran a paw gently along her belly. It was almost down to its normal size again. But it didn't quiet feel right...it gurgled loudly and she felt a movement down there. A familiar feeling in her rectum which she wouldn't hold back. She closed her teal eyes and just let it out.

A loud *bpbpbpbrrrrrrrrt* broke as the hot gas left her hole and she exhaled in finality. It didn't smell, as she hadn't eaten anything but that morsel of a human, but it was pleasing all the same.

"Oi! I heard that!" Sylveon shouted and knocked on the door, demanding her to leave at once. "You're freaking disgusting!!"

Was the pervert listening at the door? She blushed furiously in embarrassment and put her face in her paws. Yet...she couldn't but help laugh a bit. It was so naughty but it felt good.

You looked up and watched as she reached into the cupboard for a new roll of toilet paper and began to wipe.
114222222222222112221.title: She wakes up and goes to the bathroom.

choices: Leafeon knocks on the door to join in?
1142222222222221122212.content:
Sylveon cautiously walks in, his mouth agape from shock. The bathroom is a complete mess... And it's all thanks to Glaceon.

"That freaking pig! It'll take forever to clean this pigsty!" Sylveon groaned.

Your eyes lit up. Glaceon seems to be pissing everyone off! Then the idea hit you. Soon, you're clinging to the floating roll of toilet paper, screaming for help. Sylveon walks over to the toilet and a quiet *Splish* is heard.

"Agh! There's water everywhere! Did that disgusting swine even flush?" Sylveon complained.

"Wait! Sylveon! Please don't flush yet! Save me please!" You beg. He looks in the toilet, and his face shows a bit of pity and disgust.

"D-Did... Did she eat you? You poor creature!" Sylveon says, grabbing a toilet brush.

"This is the only thing that's clean in this bathroom now. I'm sorry. Can you grab it?" he asks. Grabbing the bristles, you give an affirmative. Soon, you're pulled out and placed on the sink. Sylveon begins scrubbing the toilet vigorously.

"That's just gross! She's never allowed in here again!" he promises.

"Sylveon, that's it! I know of a way to make Glaceon really suffer for what she did! We'll need to get some hot peppers, brownie mix, and some laxatives... And all the bathrooms to be occupied at the same time." You suggest.

"You, my tiny friend, are evil! I think Flareon would want in on this, too." Sylveon says with a grin. "In fact, the whole family might want to be in on this prank."

"We'll need to get the supplies." You suggest. "Where can we get some really hot peppers?"
1142222222222221122212.title: Saved by a neat-freak.

choices: Starting eating. The plan will work!
Walking past. She has stomachache from last night.
11422222222222211222121.content:
Suddenly a knock at the door catches your attention "Ummm.... excuse me... Can I come in?" a voice asks. You recognize it as Leafeon's. The grass type pokemon comes in "Oh Leafeon, what are you doing here?" Sylveon asks "Well, I was going back to my room, when I heard your plan. And I know where we can find really hot peppers" she says looking at you "Really?" you ask "Yeah, I know a place where we can find peppers "That's perfect!" you say "And I should have some brownie mix somewhere" Sylveon says "Perfect. Now we just need laxatives" you say. At this point, Sylveon and Leafeon look at each other "Flareon" they say simultaneously. Then they look at you and grin widely; you grin along them.

Standing there in the snow, shivering partly from the cold and partly from fear, you look up at the giant Umbreon as she approaches you. What does surprise you, though, is what she does next. The black-furred Pokemon crouches, lowering her head towards you as her tongue slips from between her lips. You feel her warm breath on you as she presses her tongue into you, knocking you over onto the ground. She gives you a long lick, and you shiver as her body heat transfers through your cold body. You look up at her again, barely able to see through the drool coating your face. You feel weird admitting it, but that felt really good. In this cold weather, the Umbreon's tongue was able to heat you up... But now you're starting to feel cold again. You finally realize that you're in serious trouble if you don't get warm. 131331.content:
Pinsir, the Stag Beetle Pokemon, stalked the forest, looking here and there for something to eat today. It had been fortunate for a while, and was a large example of its species, with a rounded stomach and thicker arms. As it walked along, it didn't notice the pair of vines slowly creeping up behind it, until they had grabbed it by the ankles and dragged into the bushes, shoving its feet into some tight opening in the ground. It strained and tried to pull itself free, but whatever had it was strong, and wouldn't let him go. Its ankles were being sucked in, and the interior felt thick and gooey and much too warm, and it couldn't identify what was touching it on the inside. Once its legs were securely inside, the vines came back and grabbed its wrists, tugging it from both sides and and making it impossible for the Pinsir to use its arms. The whatever-it-was was pulling it in even deeper, up to the bottom its rounded stomach. The Bug-type fought with all its might, but its main weapon was its pincher, which was useless if it couldn't bend over to bite at what was holding it. It would lean one way, the the other to try and snap the vines that were holding its arms, only to pulled in the other direction by the opposite vine. By now, it's stomach was inside the thing, and it was halfway consumed. It was then that the smell reached it, and it stopped struggling. The sweet scent... It was... intoxicating... Pinsir began to relax, looking dazed, and the vines carefully tucked its hands into the consuming maw, and its pincers barely twitched when its head was consumed, and finally its pincers themselves were claimed. The vines slipped into the ground, and there was no more movement from that place for several days, until there was a soft rumbling sound, and the hole emerged from the ground, revealing itself as the bulb on the back of an especially plump Bulbasaur. It climbed out of the hole it had used to hide while it digested the Pinsir, and now it was ready to start hunting for food again. Its bulb was unusually thick and vibrantly green, and the Bulbasaur itself was so fat it had to waddle as it walked. It was a successful predator, and was looking to evolve soon. The future was looking bright!
Then it noticed something coming down the path...
131331.title: Bulbasaur

1313321.content:
You casually walk through the woods. You're nine tails glisten in the evening sun. You just licked yourself clean under a tree and you feel pretty good about yourself. When all of the sudden it starts to rain! Your fur is plastered up against your body and you look one direction and almost close your eyes as if to say "Yeah... that figures..." You decide to lie down under a tree. You have some annoying habit of sleeping with your mouth open. You finally get to sleep.

You wake up to feel something in your mouth. You swallow, and you start to gag. You don't exactly throw up, but you were really close. Lo, and behold, standing before you was a 2 inch tall human. You heard about them in legends and fairy tales. You never thought they were real... and you thought they'd be much bigger too. You stand up and shake. You are pretty dried off now, you like once or twice here and there, then shake and your fur looks nice and fluffy. Then you turn your attention back to the human. He was sitting down watching you in disbelief as you groomed yourself.

You feel a little uncomfortable with him just sitting there, staring at you without much of an expression on his face. You decide to play a trick on him. You get in pouncing position, then just back off with your head still close to the ground. You make a rustling sound as you enter the brush behind you. You see he obviously can't see where you're going, he's looking around in a confused way. You end up behind him. You stay in pounce position for a couple more seconds. To make sure he thinks you're gone. Once he's in a false sense of security you pounce on him, playfully of course.

You didn't really need to use both paws, you have him completely pinned down with half of your right paw. You quickly turn your paw over and get him on the top side. You throw him upward as hard as you can then roll over on your back right where he is going to fall. When he lands you feel a soft thud. You had a "mutation" (not the ugly kind, the genetically altered, something isn't right, I'll explain after I finish these parentheses) If someone touched your tail, they wouldn't have a curse. You've always known that since you evolved. You really had no reason for it anyway. You suppose he thinks he just landed in a patch of grass. He looks around, your fur is taller from your chest than he is. When he looks up he realizes this isn't grass, but he doesn't know quite where he is until he spots your face looking directly at him.

You have a little hiccup, it's very small you hardly move but it forces him to fall down. You find it funny he has so little control over anything around him.

You decide to...
1313321.title: Ninetails-ness

info.brief_description: You shrink somewhere in the Pokemon world, and now the Pokemon want you!
info.description:
You're the main, an unkown non-trainer, the first chapter will ask you what gender you are so there are, so there are potentially 1000+ scenarios!(#of Pokemon times 2= more 1000+!)Almost anything goes,just keep at a 13+ level and keep it in the second person! Pokemon battles go off topic so none of those. The Pokemon might want to do several 'things' to you: eat you, befriend you, mate with you, etc. Oh yeah, I'll try and add to your interactives if you to this.(Just don't expect a long one out of me, I'm not good at putting more than 4 paragraphs a chapter) I would like this to have more additions. If you don't have an interactive to add to I'll try and reward you with gp.

Don't add chapters that only have one choice.UPDATE: I WILL NOW ALLOW POKEANTHROS AND TALKING POKEMON!!!!! WHEEE!!!

Note: I retain the right to delete poor quality additions or nonsensical paths. Try to stay at least somewhat understandable people. -_-

Notice: When attempting to delete a small number of low quality additions, writing.com apparently decided to bug out and deleted the entire Poke Anthro Prey chain. I have no way to recover these lost chapters. My apologies for any inconvenience.
